92a3('bum): yin pa de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin no/ reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// 
92a4('bum): sred pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no// len pa de'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni le nad pa ma yin no// srid pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin no/ skye ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 
92a5('bum): skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rga shem yin no/ sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yin no/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang
92a6('bum): pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyidang pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bzong po'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ 
92a7('bum): zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa/ 
92a8('bum): zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa ni dam
92b1('bum): yin no phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa
92b2('bum): de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'du ma byas stong pa
92b3('bum): nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yi no/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi zag
92b4('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni thog ma nang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong ma nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de
92b5('bum): ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no/ chos thams cad skyong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa do ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gis rkyen nyid stong pa nyid kyi rab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid tu
92b6('bum): pa nyid ma yin no// myi sa dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa zhid dag yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stos
92b7('bum): nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rdzas kyi zab pa nyid gang gi
92b8('bum): bdon dran pa zhi bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi zab pa nyid gong yang ba de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// hU~M 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul ni/ 
93a1('bum): rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no/ dbang po rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni stso
93a2('bum): rnas ma yin no byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rjes ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa ma yin no// 'phag
93a3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnaMs ma yin no// tshad myed pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshad med/ 
93a4('bum): pa nas so gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid dgang yin pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dpa' bo// rnam par tharang pa rgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rdo / 
93a5('bum): 'ang brgyang ma yin no// mthard kyis gangs pa'i snyoms par 'jugadagu bab pa nyid gang min pa de ni ma tha kyis gdas pa'i tshus 'jug pa dgu ma yin na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gang bzhi sa
93a6('bum): mtshanam myed pa dang smon pa myed pa zab panyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mnam pa myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ma yin na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes parnas
93a7('bum): ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi zan pa nyid gang yin pa don ting nge 'dzi nga ma yin no/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bab pa gang yin pa der gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yinan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu'i zab pa nying na/ 
93a8('bum): yin pa don bzhi dgashegs pa'i skabs bcu ma yinam/ myi 'jigs pa na tha ma thar gang sod pa de dam lags pa panam so/ zaso yang dag par rig pa bzhi thub pa nyid grang min par rnas pa yang dag 'a mam
93b1('bum): ma yin no snying rje chen po'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo rgyad ma yin no// thas cad shes pa
93b2('bum): nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yi/ 
93b3('bum): pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i ni/ gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi
93b4('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te 'du shes gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na
93b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te 'du byed gting dang/ ga dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ spyod do/ gal te rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi/ 
93b6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la spyod do// gal te myig gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
93b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do
93b8('bum): te lus gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro yang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid gting dpag dka' bye bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs gtong dpag
94a1('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ gal te sgra gting dpag dka' nas bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa mang tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te drigating dpag dka'
94a2('bum): zhes bya bar gyi myong mags rab kyi pa nga sbyin pa la spyod do// gas kyi gting bgad / 'a nas byu nas pa khyab song sus myong/ ma nga shig da/ zhes byabar kyi byung
94a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do gal te chos gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te myig gri 'jam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
94a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ga/ ting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te snga'i rje bar shes pa gting dpag dka' ste/ 
94a5('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gas te lce'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod nas/ sa rab kya pha rabang phyin pa la spyod do/ gal te lus kyi rnam par
94a6('bum): shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha la tu phyind pa la spyod do/ la te/ 
94a7('bum): smyig 'dus sbyi pa ga nas byab byung na phyid pa la spya / ga pa'i tshus te rig pa gti byu ga nas byabar gyi zung sas kyi pa
94a8('bum): spyod dgas te snga'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dga' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha la tu phyir dpa la spyod do/ gami da 'i 'dus te rig pa gting dpag dka' zhes skye bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
94b1('bum): phyi pas spyod // gal sus kyi lus tshig pa gting dpag dag/ 'a nas bya bar myi spyod nags ra kyi pa lang tu phyin pa la spyong du// nas nyis kyi 'dus rag pa gtang bag dga' nas bya bar gyi tshungs
94b2('bum): ril na phyin pa la stod do/ gal te myig gi 'dus pa rag pa rkyend kyis tshor pa gtong bag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rgyun kyis cher bag
94b3('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed // gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gting dpag dga' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi phar lang tu phyinadapa la spyod do// gal ta 'i/ 
94b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar stod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya ba/ 
94b5('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya ba myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khos nyi
94b6('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mye'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes
94b7('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te rlung gi khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te nam mkha'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes byan
94b8('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal ta rnam par shes pa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi smad na shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te ma rig pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod du / 
95a1('bum): rab kyi pa ma dang phyin pa la spyod nga/ gal te 'a byed gting dpag dga' nas bya bar gyi spyang na shes rab kyi ma phyid pa la stong / gas ternam par shes pa gting brag dga' zhes byo mi myong dunas
95a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mying dang gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod du/ gal te skye mched drug gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa
95a3('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te nor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do/ gal
95a4('bum): te sred pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te len pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya ba myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyind pe la spyad do// gal te srid pa nyi
95a5('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te skye ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi gtong
95a6('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dgating dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khris
95a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gding dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha robang tu phyind pa la spyod degal te bzod pa'i pha lang tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyad du/ 
95a8('bum): gal te tshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyid pal skyed de/ dal te bas pa gtan gi pa 'o sa tu phyin pa gdang dpag dka' nas bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi phar song tubyes
95b1('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gti nga dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
95b2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te phyi stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ 
95b3('bum): spyod do gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba zhes bye bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la spyod
95b4('bum): gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas na stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
95b5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gting dang/ ga dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes
95b6('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis
95b7('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod do// gal te nos thas cad stong
95b8('bum): pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gting dpagra dka'o zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te/ 
96a1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya bar myi stod na shes rab kyi ba ro mang kyi byin dpa la spyod de/ gal te ngos po med pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi skyid na shes rab kyi
96a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya ba
96a3('bum): myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin pa la spyod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams gting dpag
96a4('bum): dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dro gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya b.ramyi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa la spyod de/ gal te dbang
96a5('bum): rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi nga hrIn dbyal spya / gas d+ha stobs rnams gting dpag / zhes bya bar myi stong na shes rab kyi pha ra lang ts+tsha na pa la ska du/ 
96a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rolan tu phyinang pa la spyod do/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rkyod pa gting dpag dka' nas bya bar myi stong na shes rab kyi pa'o/ 
96a7('bum): no pa la spyod do/ gas te 'phags pa'i ba na ponams gting pag ka rjes bya ba kyi skyong gisarab kyi sa phyi pa la spyod / gam bsam gtan rnams gting ba go ka'i nas bya byar myi skyong / 
96a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin dpa la spyod do// gas te cad myed pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi ri yang tu phyin po gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi phra ma tu phyi na pa
96a9('bum): la spyod dgal te gzugs myed pa'i skyes par 'dug pa rnas
96b1('bum): pa la spyod do/ gal te rnam par thard pa rgyad gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod do/ gal te mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gting dpog dka' zhes bya ba/ 
96b2('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ 
96b3('bum): gal te rna mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzind rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
96b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting da// pag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
96b5('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mi 'jigs pa bzhi gting dang / ga dka' ba zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ 
96b6('bum): spyod do gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
96b7('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod do/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo rgyad gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag
96b8('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te rnam
96b9('bum): ga byams pa chen po gtid dag pa 'a byabar gyi spyodan shes kyi mang myin pa la spyo// 
97a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar gyi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ram tu phyin pa la spyod do/ deci'i phyir der/ gar dra de'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba gang min pa de ni/ gzugs pa
97a2('bum): yin no// tshor ba gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang min pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'du byed pa yin no/ rnam par shes
97a3('bum): gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi ting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin na/ rna'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin no/ snga'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa
97a4('bum): de ni snga ma yin no// lce'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin no// lus kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ das ma yin no/ yid gting dpag dkara' ba gang yin pa de ni yid ma yinan/ 
97a5('bum): gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi mayin no/ sgra'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni snga ma yin no/ dri'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin no// ro'i gting dpag
97a6('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni re ma yin no// reg gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin no// chos kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin no/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yi
97a7('bum): pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rna bar shems pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// 
97a8('bum): 'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba gang min par ni lho'i rnam par shes pa pa yi na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dga' ba gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pi gting da
97b1('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg
97b2('bum): ma yin no sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dpag pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag da// 
97b3('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni
97b4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rma pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye/ 
97b5('bum): kyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sma'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgya nad kyis tshor ba ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gti nga dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis nor ba ma yin
97b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i gding dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyand kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ yid kyi 'dus te / rtag pa'i rgyad kyis char ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pani
97b7('bum): rkyend kyis nor ba ma yin no// sa'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chu'i khas kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni mo'i khams ma yin no// 
97b8('bum): rlung gi las kyi gting dpag pa gang yin pa don rlung gi khams ma yon/ nam mkha'i las gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams gting dpag dka' ba grang yin pa de ri rnam pa
98a1('bum): shes pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no/ 'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba
98a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mying dang gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i ga
98a3('bum): dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no// lend pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de// 
98a4('bum): ljind pa ma yin no// srid pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yino rkang skye ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yino// sbyin pa'i pha rol
98a5('bum): tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' rnaMs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 
98a6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pag ting dpag gaka' ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
98a7('bum): ma yin no// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu nI
98a8('bum): pa ma yin no nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyir stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa
98b1('bum): de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ don dang sa/ 
98b2('bum): pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba
98b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa sgo/ nga pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste/ nga pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag
98b4('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yino/ rang zhin stong pa nyid gting dpag dka'
98b5('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thas cad stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rang gi/ 
98b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa spong sa/ 
98b7('bum): da ma yin nong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ning bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ra ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni dngos pa skyed bya stong pa nyid ma yin mo ngan
98b8('bum): ba nye bar gzhag pa'i gting dpag ka' ba gang yin pa dani dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma yon/ yang dag par snang ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa dang yang dag par spong ba ma yin/ rdzu phrul gi rkang pa'i gting dpag dkar ba
99a1('bum): g.yin pa don nu 'phrul gyi nang pa ma yin na/ dbyung po'i gting dgag pa gang med parang zung sa medan/ thams kyi gtang bag dga' ba gang yin pa dzan grangs ma yin no// byang chub kyi yang 'thun
99a2('bum): thagating dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin no/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs
99a3('bum): dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan ma yin no chad med pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chad med pa ma yin no// gzug
99a4('bum): byed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugasabyed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pargyad kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rna par thar pa rgyang/ 
99a5('bum): yin no mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu'i gting dpag dka ba gang yin pa de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i ltos par 'dug pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smin pa mye
99a6('bum): pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de'i rnam par thar pa'i tshwa spang pa nyid dang pacan ma myed pa dang smon pa byed pa dang ma yinan/ mngon par gas pa'i gting dpag dga' ba gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa ma yin no// ting nga 'dzin du
99a7('bum): dpag dgalta ba gang yin pa don ting 'dzin ma yid/ gzungs kyi sgo gting dpag dka' ba gang min pa doni gzungs kyi sgra pa yidan no// de ba'i dag shegs pa'i stobs bcu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa dani bzhin gshegs pa'i ldan
99a8('bum): yum me ni byi rigs pa pa de gting pag ga' ba gang med par ngam 'dzirnam pa panim mdzan/ sa mang dag par theg pa pa nid ga tidang dang ga ka' ba gang yin pa darnam ma yang dgapa rig pa 'im mni byas pache pa'i gte
99b1('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po ma yin na/ snying rje chen pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres/ 
99b2('bum): bcu rgyad ma yin no/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no/ rna ba thas
99b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs na/ 
99b4('bum): myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad do/ gal tshor ba chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de// gal te 'du shes chad myed do// zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
99b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te 'du byed cang myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na rab kyi pha rol tu phyind la spyod de/ gal te rnam par shes pa da myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
99b6('bum): gal te myig nang med de zhes bya bar mi spyong na shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rdza bachang myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang kyi mya nad pa la spyo dang / gal te snga chang myed do zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes pa
99b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal te khyi mang myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyir pa la spyod do/ gal te lus chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dang/ gal te yid / 
99b8('bum): myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te sgra tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
100a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod da gal te dri nad byed de/ zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal tar chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal te ga cang myed
100a2('bum): thar zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal ta chos cad med do zhes bya bar myi spyong ra shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal ta myig gi rnam par shes pa chad myed de/ zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes ma
100a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed do// zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad med do// zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
100a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod da/ gal te lce'i rnam par shes bya skye sbyod ba kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam pa shes pa chang myed de/ zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
100a5('bum): la spyod de/ gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
100a6('bum): pa la spyod / gam tan pa'i 'dus te rig pa cad med de zhes bya bar gyi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu byin dpa la spyod do/ gal te sna'i 'dus te rag pa chad byed de zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha'i lang tu phyin pal spyang dag
100a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa/ 
100a8('bum): chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na sheng rab kyi par yang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus de rag pa chad myed nga zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ma tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal ten ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyed kyis tshor bam
100b1('bum): med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyad do/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i byed kyis tshal
100b2('bum): ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg
100b3('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te sa'i khas tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te chu'i khams tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod
100b4('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mye'i khas tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod gal te rlung gi khams tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga
100b5('bum): la spyod do gal te nam mkha'i khams tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i kha sa tshad med zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do gal te ma/ 
100b6('bum): rig pa chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod / gal te 'du byed cang myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal te rnam par shes pa chang med de zhes bya byar myi spyod na re/ 
100b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te mying dang gzugs tshad med do// zhes bya bar bya myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ni skye mched drug tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la s+ho/ 
100b8('bum): gal te reg pa chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal ta nor ba chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol dan phyird pa la spyod do/ gal te sred pa chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod ni
101a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te len pa chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te srid pa chad byed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
101a2('bum): gal te skye ba tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab
101a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la tshad med do/ zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pA zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
101a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyid pa na/ da med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la s+ho byed do/ gal te bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad med do zhes bya
101a5('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshad myed pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ gal te nang stong pa nyid chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ 
101a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod de/ gal te phyi stong pa nyid chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid chang myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
101a7('bum): la spyod do gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te don
101a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid chang med do zhes byabar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du
101b1('bum): myong ngo zhes bya bar myi smyon na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ga
101b2('bum): myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolapa tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ra bzhin stong pa nyid chad myed do zhes bya bar myi
101b3('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol ba tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do/ zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ 
101b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid chang myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa la spyod do/ gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes ra
101b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chang myed do zhe/ sa bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chad med do zhes bya bar myi
101b6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu rgyand pa la spyod do/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams cad med do zhes
101b7('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na
101b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te stobs rnams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab / 
102a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa chang myed do zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyin pa la spyod de/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chad med do zhes bya/ 
102a2('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ gal te bsam gtan rnams cad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyin pa la spyod de/ gal te chad med pa rdzas cang med do zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyis
102a3('bum): rolang du phyin pa la spyod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams cad med do zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal rnam par thard pa rgyad cad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi phar/ 
102a4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ pa dku chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ da pa la spyod do/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtsha
102a5('bum): ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa chad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams cad med do zhes za bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te
102a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te de bzhin
102a7('bum): gshegs pa'i spobs bcu cang myod du zhes bye bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa yang tu phyid pa la spyod de// gal te myi 'jigs pa bzhi chad med de zhes byab par myi spyod na shes rab kyi pa mong tu phyinang po la myang / gas chos
102a8('bum): sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi cang byed do zhes bya bar myi skyed na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin dpa la spyod de/ gal te byams pa chen po tshad med do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ gal te
102b1('bum): chen po tshad myed de zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyang cad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thos/ 
102b2('bum): cad shes pa nyid tshad myed do// zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do/ gal te rna ba thos cad
102b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid chad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// bam po
102b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na sha dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzu dgas ma yin no/ tshor ba tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi tshad gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi/ 
102b5('bum): tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ myig gi tshad gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no/ rna ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin/ 
102b6('bum): sna'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni snga ma yin no// lce'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin no// lus kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin no// yid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi tshad myed// 
102b7('bum): gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ sgra'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin no// dri'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin no/ ro'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin no// reg gi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin no// 
102b8('bum): chos kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi myig/ gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rdza ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rna bar shes pa na/ 
103a1('bum): yin no sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni sna rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa/ 
103a2('bum): tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus
103a3('bum): te reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa gang yin pa don
103a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus reg pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa da ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// myig gi su
103a5('bum): tereg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i nang skyed pa gang yin pa don mig gi 'dus te rerig pa'i rkyed kyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par kyind kyis tshor ba'i chad med pa gang yin pa deni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan kyis ca
103a6('bum): bas yin no/ lnga'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis nor ba'i mang bad pa gang yin pa dor lnga'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yid no// lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i byed kyis tshor ba gang yin pa de ni lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis mang/ 
103a7('bum): ba ma yin no lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi snga char ba chad med pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba cad med pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
103a8('bum): kyis tshor ba ma yin no// sa'i khams cad med pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khas ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi chad med pa gang yin pa don nu'i khas ma yin no// phyi'i khams kyi chad med pa gang yin pa de ni mo'i bas ma yin no// rlung gi las
103b1('bum): kyi chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no// namakha'i khams tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad myed do zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab gling yin pa de ni rnam par shes
103b2('bum): pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no/ rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mying dang / 
103b3('bum): gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa/ 
103b4('bum): de ni nor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa ma yin no// len pa'i chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni len pa ma yin no// srid pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin no// skye ba'i chad myed pa gang yin/ 
103b5('bum): pa de ni skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni rga/ shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni nad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa/ 
103b6('bum): tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad med pa gang
103b7('bum): yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang myed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gi pha ralang tu phyind pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang myed pa gang yin pa dan
103b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi chad med pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin na/ phyi nang srong pa nyid kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni
104a1('bum): phyinang stong pa zhing ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chang med pa gang yin pa de ni snang ba nyid stong ba nyid pa yin no/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chang med pa gang med par ni chen po spong pa nyid pa med/ ngan dam pa sa
104a2('bum): thanyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa
104a3('bum): nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa ga/ rang yin pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa nga ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa'i
104a4('bum): der ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chad med pa gang yin pa de ni der ba med par ra ba nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang med pa gang yin/ pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chang med pa/ 
104a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni chos thos cad stong pa nyid ma yin no rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ 
104a6('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chad med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chad myed pa gang yin par ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid smod pa nyid ga yin pa de ni dngos
104a7('bum): po med pa nga ba nyid spang ba nyid ma yin dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams kyi chad med pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// yang dag par spang ba rnams kyi chad med pa gang yin pa de ni ying dag par spong ba rdza/ 
104b1('bum): ma yin no rdzu 'phrul gyi pa rnams kyi chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyi chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no/ stobs rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni stobs rma/ 
104b2('bum): ma yin no/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chad myed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma
104b3('bum): yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// tshad med pa rnams kyi tshad med
104b4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni chad med pa rnams ma yin no// gzugs me dpa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams kyi chad med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i skyes par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// rnam par thard pa rgyang
104b5('bum): kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa rgyad ma yin no/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu'i chad med pa gang yin pa nga ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu ma yin / dernam par
104b6('bum): tha rang pa'i sgro snang pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par skye
104b7('bum): bla rnams ma yin no/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no/ gdus kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i chang mo
104b8('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i nang med pa gang yin pa de ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no/ myi 'jigs ste yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni sa so
105a1('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no/ byams bu chen po'i tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po ma yin no/ snying rje chen po'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
105a2('bum): brgyad kyi tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo rgyad ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin
105a3('bum): pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ga nyid kyi nang med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ sha rangadwa ti'i bu'i gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi phre
105a4('bum): tu phyind pa 'di ni de ltar drab po/ de ltar gting dpag dka'o// de ltar gto gras par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni de ltar chad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' si
105a5('bum): dpa' chen po theg la gsar du zhugs pa mdun du bshad par myi bgyi ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'jigs sdang // zhing skrag par 'gyur du mchi'o// the tsom dang nem nur 'tshal du mchi'o// 
105a6('bum): mos par yang myi 'gyur du mchi'o/ bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di snyan par bgyi ste/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
105a7('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo/ 'di thos nas mi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// the tsom dang nem nur 'chal bar myi 'gyur ro/ thos nas kyang gang nas gong du mos pa dang 'dzin pa dang ladra 'anang ba dang klog pa dang / kun nub par bgyid pa dang de
105a8('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ro/ de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bul 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bugs te theg pa lags du zhug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
105b1('bum): chen po'i drung du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa ke'u shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun du shes
105b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di snyan na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'jig sgra sdang bar 'gyur skrag par mi 'gyur te/ phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// spong bar 'gyur ro// da ni mos par yang myi 'gyu
105b3('bum): te ke'u shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos nas spangs pa'i phyir de log par lhung bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par byed cing lpags pa dang / 
105b4('bum): bya ba dang sngags pa des kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar yang dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas da yod do// rgya byind gyis smras pa btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
105b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lungs snyand pa/ shes rab pa ro la tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ myi 'jigs mi spang skrag par myi 'gyur ba wa gal yod dam/ spros pa ga'u ni
105b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ myi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de ni/ ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
105b7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu lung stan par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu/ 
105b8('bum): kyi bar du lung snyan par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
106a1('bum): dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang
106a2('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa de dag niyun ring po nas theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'o// pha rol tu phyinang pa drug la spyod pa'o// sangs
106a3('bum): rgyas mang po la snyen bkur byas/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dpe' gsol bar bdag gis baspobs so// 'de bar gshegs pa de'i dpe' gsal bar bdag gis baspobs so
106a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis spo bas pa skyed cig na sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
106a5('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i skyilas na/ shes rab kyi b.ro/ lang tu byind pa bsgoma'i nga bsam gtan la bsgoms pa 'dug pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / bzod
106a6('bum): pa sgrub pa dang / rdul khrims srus pa dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / snying po byang chub la mchis par gyur na'ang / ma ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ de ni bla na ma
106a7('bum): pa yang dag par brdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nyo bar 'gyur bar rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyid kyis ma log pa zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa
106a8('bum): dang bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / nul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba lta spos kyang ci 'chal te/ bcom ldan
106b1('bum): 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thon
106b2('bum): nas 'dzin cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan tu bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smind pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo/ 
106b3('bum): 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa 'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag pa ru zhugs zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'o// sangs rgyas mang po/ 
106b4('bum): snyen bkur ba'o// dge ba'i gshes gnyen gis yongs su bzung / pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu/ mo gang de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
106b5('bum): byang chub tu lung stand pa dang / nye bar gyur pa dang / bla na med pa yang nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung snyan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gi tshe/ shwe/ 
106b6('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad cing 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
106b7('bum): de dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par rig par bgyid pa dag go/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad rgyab zhig nas
106b8('bum): 'byung ba 'am/ 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa dang / sum rgya ba dang / bzhi rgyab dang / lnga brgya pa nas byung ba zhig mchis la/ de byung ba'i che grang dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang khams dang / 
107a1('bum): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi lnga ltas ba lang rdzi'am/ phyug rdzi'am/ sa 'tshams sam/ bza' shing gi rab phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ nags chal phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam/ 
107a2('bum): de ma lags pa gzhan yang mtshan ma gang gis grong ngangam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na mchis pas mngon pa'i lnga ltas de lta bu dag mthong na de 'di snyam du gyur te la
107a3('bum): lhas 'di dag snang ba lags na/ 'di nas grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/ khams sam rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ni nye ba snyam ste dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ de slad chad rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am chom sde
107a4('bum): 'jigs pa 'am gcan zan 'khro'a'i 'jigs pa 'am/ bkres pa'am/ sgom pa'i 'jigs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe
107a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'thad par 'gyur te/ 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chatho ba dang / klog ba dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid/ 
107a6('bum): la bgyid na bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung snyan pa la nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi 'o// ring po myi thigs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs sa
107a7('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sman cad nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'jigs par myi bgyi'o/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
107a8('bum): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan du mchis pa de'i dabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snga ltas sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
107b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ re de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis dung yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus spobs pa skyed cig/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig rgya mtsho gting rnams chen po
107b2('bum): lta bar 'tshal nas/ de rgya mtsho chen po lnga 'chal ba'i slad du/ de ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar mchis pa de lta de ltar ldum bu 'am ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma mthong na/ nges 'di nas rgya mtsho chen
107b3('bum): po dang thag nye ste/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ni yun ring po myed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po na bags kyis bzhol ba ste/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i drung du da ni ring po myed do/ de dang nye ba na ni ldum bu 'am lU
107b4('bum): bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma gang yang yod do// zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o// de ltar skyes bu de'i myig gi rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang / des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye
107b5('bum): bar gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di ni yod do// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di phan chad myi ring ngo // zhes bgyi bar rtogs par 'tshal lo// bco ma ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyan
107b6('bum): cing 'dzin pa dang 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por kyang bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzos
107b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas khyod bskal pa 'di snyed cig/ skal pa stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig/ skal pa rgya phrag stong ni 'di snyed cing / skal pa bye ba phrag khrig rgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig/ na bla na med pa yang / 
107b8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon sum du lung bstan pas/ da dung lung ma snyand pa'i gyis kyang bdag
108a1('bum): ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung snyan pa dang / nye bar gnas par blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di/ 
108a2('bum): thalta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur yongal/ mnyan du yod do// thos nas kyang bzung du yod do// bcang tu yod do/ klag tu yod do// kun chub par byar yod do// tshul bzhin du yid la byar yod do/ zhes
108a3('bum): bya bar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste dper na/ dbring gi du sa la bab pa'i na/ shing gi mo ma dang / 'dab ma lhags nas kha dog tu gyur da pa'i ma/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i phyi rnams/ 
108a4('bum): kyes ring ba myi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu mthong bar 'gyur ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar swa m+b+ha/ sa 'di dag ni rtsi shing las sdang ngo // zhes bgyi bar 'tshal
108a5('bum): bar bgyi ste/ gang gi tshe rtsi shing rnams lo ma dang / mye tog dang 'dra sa bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba mthong ba'i de'i tshe/ 'ang bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u bu mo de dag gis brtsi shing gi
108a6('bum): lo ma dang me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas nyams bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi ni/ shes
108a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mnyan du mchis te/ thos nas kyang 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 
108a8('bum): tshul bzhin tu yi la bgyid pa do'i tsha bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rig pa'i rtsab yongs su sbyin par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' stsams
108b1('bum): dpa' chen po sangs rgyas mang po la snyen bkur bgyis par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kyang 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa za' ma/ 
108b2('bum): 'di lta ba dang phyag bya ba dang / snyen bkur ba dang / mnyan pa yod pa dang / ji skad du snyan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan bya bar yod pa ni sngon gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
108b3('bum): byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa to// zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ de na lha'i bu sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i snga ltas de na dag mthong / 
108b4('bum): nas sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lung snyan pa dar 'gyur te/ yang sA ltas 'di dag byang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang ring po mi thogs par bla na med
108b5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung snyan par 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar dga' zhing spro la yid bde zhing nyams bde bar 'gyur ro// rtabacom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na bud med sbrum ma ni ji lta ji/ 
108b6('bum): ltar btsar bar bya ba de lta de lta bur lus gyu rad te/ de lta de ltar slar zhing lus ngal la skyud shan cing mi 'gal/ kha zas yi gar mi 'chi zhing chug sa pa dang / gnyid chung ngur 'gyur te/ nyams mi bde des smra
108b7('bum): banyung zhing sten pa'i ngang tshul mchis la sngon gi tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i yid la bgyid pa sten pa dang / snyen pa des rnam pa de lta bu'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ bud med bzhin dag gis bud med de'i mtshan ma ji lta ji
108b8('bum): ltar mthong ba las bud med 'di ni ring po myi thogs par bu bca bar 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi bar 'chald to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems snyed pa sangs rgyas mang
109a1('bum): po la snyed bkur ba/ legs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ dge ba'i gshes gzhan gyis yongasu bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyin pa rnams la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zan
109a2('bum): mo 'thad par 'gyur te/ 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun banub par bgyid pa dang / rdul bzhin du yid la bgyid la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ 
109a3('bum): ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung snyan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// sha ra
109a4('bum): bu khyod kyis slebs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
109a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang / nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar leg dras par yongasu bzung ba ming mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
109a6('bum): sprul pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po de dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / lha dang myi'i skye bo'i
109a7('bum): tshogs phal po che'i don dang / bde ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sku ba'i dngos po bzhis so/ 
109a8('bum): can rgya stong mang po la phan 'dogs te/ bzhi gang zhe na sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / ngan mthun par spyod pa de dag gis/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul lo/ ba
109b1('bum): kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms pa'i 'dug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'dug la/ gzhan yang bas/ 
109b2('bum): gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang bsam ga tan ba
109b3('bum): pa la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan pa zhi ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang byams pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin
109b4('bum): la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang snying rje'i ting nge 'dzi nad la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
109b5('bum): la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang dga' ba'i ting nge 'ja nad la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzind la smos par 'jug la/ gzhan yang btang snyoms
109b6('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzind la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'dug la gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag
109b7('bum): kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'dug la/ gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par
109b8('bum): 'jug la gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang 'du shes myed/ 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yi snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang 'di shes
110a1('bum): myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang sbyin pa la yongs su gtang la/ gzhan yang skyon pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyi tshul khrims srung la gzhan yang tshul khri/ 
110a2('bum): la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang bzod pa sgom la/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par sku'o/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus yang dag par skul/ bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug
110a3('bum): la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par sku lo/ bdag kyang shes rab sgom la/ gzhan yang shes rab sgom pa la yang dag par skul lo// de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas sems
110a4('bum): can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod kyang rgyun tu zhugadras pa'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed do// gzhan yang lan cig phyira'ong ba'i 'bras bu rab tu 'god kyang bdag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
110a5('bum): bu thob par myi byed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god kyang rje ngag kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la thob par myi byed do// gzhan dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god kyang / bdag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid
110a6('bum): par myi byed do// gzhan yang rang byang chub la rab tu 'god kyang / bdag kyang rang byang chub mngon du mi byed do// bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang sbyin gyi/ 
110a7('bum): pa yong tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la yang dag par skul yi// 
110a8('bum): bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dog kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod la
110b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma dag kyang
110b2('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la yang dag par
110b3('bum): skul lo/ bdag kyang phyir myi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon la gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god do// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed la/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag sgra
110b4('bum): bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la yang dag par skul lo// gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang byang chub sems dang/ 
110b5('bum): mngon par shes pa skyed la gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon pa shes pa la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgoyongs su spyong la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo yongasu sbyong ba la yang dag
110b6('bum): sku lo/ bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed la/ gzha na yang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bde ga kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yong su 'dzin la gzhan yang gzugs
110b7('bum): phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par sku'o/ bdag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed la/ gzhan yang mtshan ma phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa la
110b8('bum): yongasu 'dzin la/ gzhan yang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par sku lo/ bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom la gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang drag par sku lo/ bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba
111a1('bum): bzhi la sgom la/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par sku 'o/ bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi la sgom la/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang dbang po lnga sgom la
111a2('bum): gzhan yang dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang stobs lnga la sgom la/ gzhan yang stobs lnga la yang dag par skye lo/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sgom la gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag
111a3('bum): par skul lo// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom la/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sgom la gzhan yang 'phags pa'i
111a4('bum): bden pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi la sgom la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ bad dag kyang tshad myed pa bzhi sgom la gzhan yang tshad myed pa bzhi la yang dag par
111a5('bum): rnam sa/ das kya du sa myed pa snyoms par 'jug pa ba'i sgom la gzhan yang gzugs sred pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa ban dag par smra'o/ bag kyang sa pa mas brgyad snyom la ga'an pa / 
111a6('bum): thar pa brgyad la yang dag par sku'o/ bdag kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom la/ gzhan yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pati
111a7('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sgom la/ gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la yang dag par sku 'o/ bdag kyang mngon par shes pa sgom la gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la
111a8('bum): dag par sku lo/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad sgom la gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la yang dag par sku lo/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgom la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par sku 'o/ bdag tu
111b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom la/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang myi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang
111b2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang byams pa chen po sgom la gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par sku 'o/ bdag kyang snying rje chen po sgom
111b3('bum): la/ gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom la/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par sku'o/ bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad
111b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed la/ gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen rab nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong la gzhan yang bag chags kyi
111b5('bum): mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la yang dag par skul// bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor la/ gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor/ lo skor ba la yang dag par sku lo/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang tshe dang ldan
111b6('bum): rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan mang po de dag sems can thams cad kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bla na myed pa
111b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtsharang to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtsha rang to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes
111b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs
112a1('bum): kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ba de rig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' so
112a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'tsho ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yong su rdzogs
112a3('bum): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'du shes kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
112a4('bum): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'a gyur ro// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam 'du byed kyi 'phel bdang
112a5('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgom pa yong su rdzo/ gas par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
112a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjesu myi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yong
112a7('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam myig gi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
112a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byorarang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ na rna ba'i 'phel ba yang dag pa
112b1('bum): rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
112b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sna'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' rje
112b3('bum): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lce'i 'phel ba dang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byord
112b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang/ pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma ma/ thong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
112b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la so dpa'i tshe/ nam yid kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub
112b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam gzugs kyi 'phel
112b7('bum): ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
112b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sgra'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa'
113a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dri'i 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// 
113a2('bum): rabang byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ro'i 'phel pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba der ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha yang tu bye pa
113a3('bum): sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'a'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam reg gi 'phel ba yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems das
