150a7('bum): zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab po/ rab 'byorang chad med pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo/ rab 'byor gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zam/ 
150a8('bum): rab 'byor rnam par tha rad pa rgyad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ rab 'byor nga mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab po/ rab 'byor rje bar tha
150b1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smond pa med pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab po/ rab 'byor nga ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir te/ 
150b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa zab po/ rab 'byor nga gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab po/ rab 'byorang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab po/ rab 'byor nga mi 'di
150b3('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab po/ rab 'byord so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab po// rab 'byor de snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa za'o/ 
150b4('bum): rab 'byorang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nad pa zab bo/ rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir she/ ngas rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab po/ rab 'byor de lam gyi rnam pa / 
150b5('bum): pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab po/ rab 'byorang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu nad pa zab po/ gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha'o// 
150b6('bum): tuphyird pa ni chos rin po che'i phung po ste/ chos rin po che'i phung po rnams sgrub pa'o// 'di lta ste dge ba bcu'i las kyi las bsgrub pa'o// bsam gtan pa'i sgrub pa'i tshad myed pa ba ni sgrub pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ 
150b7('bum): bsgrub pa'o// mngon pa gas pas sgrub pa'o// dran panye bar gnag pa po ni sgrub pa'o// sang dag par spod ba rnams srung phyir/ nu 'phrul gi sang pa bani bsgrub par/ drabang po lnga bsgrub pa'i/ slobs lnga bsgrub pa'o// bya
150b8('bum): yan lag bdun bsgrub pa'o/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa bsgrub pa'o/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// rnam par tha rad pargyad sgrub pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgrub pa'o// rnam par
151a1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa bsgrub pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams sku pa / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa'o// de bzhin shegs pa'i skabs bcu sgrub pa'o// myi 'jigs pa pa'i sgrub pa'o// so so/ 
151a2('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// snying rje chen po sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa bco rgyad sgrub pa'o// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu s+thAH
151a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa'o// rang byang chub sgrub pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyi nad pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'o// bcoM ldan
151a4('bum): 'das gzugs dag pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / 'du shes dag pa dang / 'du byed/ dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / myig dag pa dang rna ba dag pa dang / sna dag pa dang / lce dag pa dang / lus dag pa dang yid dag pa dang / 
151a5('bum): gzugs dag pa dang / sgra dag pa dang / dri dag pa dang / ro dag pa dang / reg dag pa dang chos dag pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i rnam parashes pa dag pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang lce'i rdza par
151a6('bum): pa dag pa dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang lus kyi
151a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / 
151a8('bum): sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / sa'i khas dag pa dang / chu'i khas dag pa dang / mye'i khams dag pa dang rlung gi khas dag dang
151b1('bum): nam mkha'o khas dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khas dag pa dang / ma rig pa dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / mying dang gzugs dag pa dang / skye mched drug dag pa dang / reg pa dag pa dang tshor ba dag/ 
151b2('bum): dang sred pa dag pa dang / len pa dag pa dang / srid pa dag pa dang / skye ba dag pa dang / rga shi dag pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dag pa dang / 
151b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha ro sa tu phyind pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dag pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dag pa dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang stong pa'i
151b4('bum): stong pa nyid dag pa dang can po stong pa nyid dag pa dang / doradapa pa stong pa nyid dag par 'dus byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma medapa/ 
151b5('bum): spang bshing dag pa dang / ngar ba med pa skyong ba nyid dag pa dang / rang bzhi srid kyi da dag pa dang / chas zas cad stong pa zhid dag po dang / rang gi mtsha da stong pa nyid dag pa dang / byi dmyigs pa stong pa'id dag pa dang
151b6('bum): rgyang ba stong pa zhid dag pa dang / ra ba nyid stong pa nyid dag padang / dngos pa myed pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhid dag pa dang / dran pa na bar gzhag pa dag padag / yang dag par spong ba dag pa dang / chu 'phrul gyi nang pa dag pa dang / dbang po dag pa dang / stongs sa
151b7('bum): pa dang byang chub kyi yan sa gdag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan sag rgyang ba dag pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan dag pa dang chang byed pa dag pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dag pa dang / rje bar na
151b8('bum): bangan pad mnyan kyis gdas pa'i stobs pa chug pa dgu na ba dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mnan sa myed pa dang sngon pa byung ba dag dang / ma pa mas pa dag pa dang / ting nga 'dzid dag pa dang / gtus kyi ga
152a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dag pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dag dang / snying rje chen po dag pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad dag pa dang thams cad shes pa nyid dag
152a2('bum): dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di lta bu stand pa'i tshe/ bar chad mang du myi 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das
152a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo// 'di la bar chad mang du byung ste/ de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma
152a4('bum): bri ba dang klag pa dang snyand pa dang / nul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / sgom par bya ba la bar chad du mi 'byung bar bri na yang / myur du bri bar bya'o/ brla ga na yang myur du rlig go/ bstan pa na yang myur du stan to// tshul bzhin du yid la
152a5('bum): byan yang nul bzhin du yid la bya'o// bsgom na yang myur du sgom par byor/ rab 'byorang do bA sman rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi mos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di zla ba gcig gis bri bar byas na yang de bzhi/ 
152a6('bum): du bri bar bya'o// gal te zla ba gnyis sam gal te zla ba gzum 'am/ gal te zla ba bzhi 'am gal te zla ba lnga 'am/ gal te zla ba drug gam gal te lo'i bar gyis bri bar byas na yang de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gal te zla ba gcig gi
152a7('bum): bstan pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton du bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / sgom par byas nas yang de bzhin du sgom par bya'o// gal te lo'i bar gis sgom par byas na yang / de bzhin du sgom par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
152a8('bum): nar bu rin po n+ye lwa bar myang du 'byung ngo // gsal dpa bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ci nas kyang myi bri ba dang / mi bklag pa dang / myi snyand pa dang / kha ton du mi bgyi ba dang / yid la myi bgyi ba dang / myi sgom
152b1('bum): pa'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag bar chad myi bgyi ba ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab byor da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la ci nas kyang myi bri ba dang / myi bklag pa dang / myi snyan pa dang kha to// 
152b2('bum): du myi byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la myi bya ba dang / myi sgom pa'i phyir bdud sdig to can par chad mi byed pa yang ma yin mod kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha'i lang tu phyind pa zab mo 'dri ba dang / klogs
152b3('bum): dang kha don byed pa dang / sgom pa rnams la bar chad bya bar myi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i mthus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shwe/ 
152b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang klag pa dang / kha ton du bya/ ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ba dang / sgom pa la bdud sdig to// can bgegs bgyid par myi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsnga lang ba/ 
152b5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab ma 'dri 'dri ba dang klog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom dgas
152b6('bum): bdud sdig ta can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhug shing mtsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gi mthus kyang bya
152b7('bum): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang ston pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yin la byed pa dang / sbom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar
152b8('bum): bya bar myi nus so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de dag la dgongs shing yongs su 'dzin pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis yongs su bzung ba'i byang
153a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang snyand pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / rdul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / sgom par dag 'dud
153a2('bum): sdig ta can gyis bar chad bya bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyis yongs su zind pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyis dge ba'i chos yongasu btsal ba la bdud sdig tu can gyi/ 
153a3('bum): bar chad bya bar myi nus/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni gang da ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs myed pa dag na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chad med grangs mye
153a4('bum): pa na bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang dgos pa mchad pa dang / klog cing ston pa dang / 
153a5('bum): ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang sgom pa dang la dgongs pa mdzad pa ni chos nyid kyis de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang klog/ 
153a6('bum): dang ston pa dang / nul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / skam pa des kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o// klog go ston to/ kha ton du byed do// nul bzhin du yid la byed do// skom
153a7('bum): ma/ zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zabu mo 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang / ston
153b1('bum): pa dang / kha tan du bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / skem mo 'acwal kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus lags sam/ kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs lags snyam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ldan
153b2('bum): shar dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin ni/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'ang rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'i / 
153b3('bum): dang bskon cing kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la brjod cing skom pa de dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par rig par bya'o// dathams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs yin/

154a1('bum): nul bzhin du yid ga byed cing sbom de dag ni shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang nogs dang shar phyogs kyi phyogs 'jams dang / shAr lho'i phyogs kyi phyogs 'tshams drang po

154b1('bum): dpyid kyis sbyin pa'i ma ma du phyin pa da nga rnam yang 'phral bar myi 'gyur ro/ rlus khrims kyi sa phyin pa da ma sang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha ma phyin pa dang sa sang rnas par gyi 'gyuraro/ btsun sa

155a7('bum): kyi rgyud na spyod par gyur te/ de na byang chub ses dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang dge steng ma dang dge snyen dang / dge snyen mdag mos pa dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur 'a
155a8('bum): 'gyur klog par 'gyur kun nub par byed par 'gyur/ nul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ mye tog dang 'breng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / rdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / khadan mang pos rigra
155b1('bum): byed kur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung ba su m+b+hi sa dang ste/ de dag gis lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing pha rol da tu phyi nad pa drug gis
155b2('bum): mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de dag pha rold tu phyind pa drug po dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang bkur sti dang / phu tud dang mchod par byed cing nyan thos
155b3('bum): kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
155b4('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas yul bar ta ni na spyod pa/ ra 'gyur te/ de na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge snyen dang dge snyen ma dang / mos pa dam pas shes rab kyi pha rol
155b5('bum): phyind pa bab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun nub par byed par 'gyur/ nul ba zhin tu yid la byed par 'gyur te/ mye tog dang 'breng ba dang spos dang byug par/ 
155b6('bum): phye ma dang na bza' dang / rmugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mang pos 'am gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dung tu byed mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ dag dge ba'i rtsab des nam yang ngan sang log par ltung bar mi 'dod ste/ dag/ 
155b7('bum): gis lnga dang pyi'i bun su mtshogs pa myong zhing pa ro lang tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/ dadag pa mang tu phyin pa drug po dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam ma
155b8('bum): rim gyis mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yul bar ta ni nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgyung na spyod par 'gyur te/ ngan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i dge slong
155b9('bum): ris gro nga kur sti dang du du chod pa byed ming nyan po kyi mig pa lang/ rangasas rgyas kyi mig pa ma/ thad byed pa ga par rdzogs da'isas rgyas kyi ga lan che pan
156a1('bum): dge slong ma dang dge snyen dang dge snyen pa dag mos pa dam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ 
156a2('bum): thatshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang 'phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dung du byed mchod/ 
156a3('bum): pa byed par 'gyur te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang nga ne sang log par ltung bar mi 'dod ba ste/ de dag gis lnga pa myi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol tu phyind pa drug gis 'phags par 'gyur/ de dag pha rol
156a4('bum): tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byed pa cing nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am rang sangs
156a5('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa 'am bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gdum pos rim gis mya ngan las 'dang bar 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha/ 
156a6('bum): rolang tu phyin pa za mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud dang / byang phyogs kyi rgyud dbye ma la cus phyi ma'i chi/ lnga brgya tha mas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
156a7('bum): pa'i dgongs pa gang yin pa doni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos dang 'dul ba ngalnga bab pa'i che/ chos nub par ni/ 
156a8('bum): 'gyur te/ chos de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di'o/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi dra lA ma rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / 
156b1('bum): nub par byed pa dang / nus bzhin du maud la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid dun tan du byed pa de dag la nings na tsho/ shar dwa ti'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum ga gas rab kyi pa mang tsan dpapa' po 'dzi sa pa/ 
156b2('bum): kyang me tog dang 'phreng ba dang sras dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / nabapa' dang / gtugs dang rgyas dang / bdan mang poH/ rim gror byed bkur stir byed/ phu drung du byed/ mnad par byed pa de dag kyang ngas dgongs te/ garaH
156b3('bum): ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag lha dang myi'i phun su tshogs pa myong zhing pha rol tu phyind pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par
156b4('bum): 'gyur ro// de dag pha rol tu phyi nang pa drug po de dag gis mngon bar 'phags par gyur da nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod
156b5('bum): ba byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pan/ theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur
156b6('bum): do ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyad kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin/ 
156b7('bum): gshegs pas brjod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas stod do// sngags so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gsheg
156b8('bum): bu dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyeng ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin shegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas za kyi
157a1('bum): spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do sngags so// rigs kyi
157a2('bum): tha bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
157a3('bum): kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstond do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / 
157a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing skyong ba dang / chos bston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
157a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis gzig so/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brjod do// 
157a6('bum): bstod do sngags so// rigs kyi dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin
157a7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis gzigaso/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
157a8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod / bdod do sngags so/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang gar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas bzhugs
157b1('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gsheg
157b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa yang dga' ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do sngags so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
157b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de dag zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzig so/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
157b4('bum): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bad+mo da de/ stod do sngags so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
157b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho slong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan
157b6('bum): kyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do stod do sngags so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
157b7('bum): dag ni nub byad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / ches stonang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
157b8('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do sted do// 
158a1('bum): thugs po'igs kyi cud migs kyi da ga gi phyogs kyi shin ga gas pa dashA rlom pa yang dag par rdzogs thams rgyas zhugs shing ba spong bdang / ma myong pa na pa
158a2('bum): bdag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigaso// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
158a3('bum): de dag gis brjod do// khyod do sngags so// rigs kyi du dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni snying kyi phyogs kyi de bzhin gzigs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing ba spyod ba dang / chos ston pa
158a4('bum): dgra som pa yang dag gyur rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis pa rang sangs rgyas kyi sun gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang 'i dwags kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
158a5('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do bsngags so// gsol lang pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di skad ma'i dus slang ma'i chen byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur
158a6('bum): som ldan 'das kyis bka' du 'drug/ kAng 'i bu de de bzhinan/ de de bzhin te/ gar dwa ti'i bums rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ab ma 'ad phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe byung rdzogs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ des thar da ti'i bu/ 
158a7('bum): phyira'i dus kyi ba'i chen/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rab sde pa rol tu phyin pa ba mo 'di nang par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ro// mos par byas nas kyang 'dri ba dang 'dzind pa dang
158a8('bum): 'dra ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / nul bzhin du yid la byed cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed par 'gyuraro// ka ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa
158b1('bum): mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par byed pa dang / mos par byas nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing tshul la bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin du nan tan byed pa de dag ni yun ring po nas
158b2('bum): theg sa payang dag par zhugs pa sa/ sas rgyas yang ngos bsnyen bdu pa dang / dge song bzhes garten gis yongs su pa dang / dag pa'i bskyed pa mig par bya/ so 'ad pa/ mam ldan 'das spang ba'i dus snang
158b3('bum): chen byang phyogs kyi ma der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs pang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha 'i la tu phyi nang pa 'ang mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyis nas 'dri zhing
158b4('bum): padang 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing tshul dri/ na du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid de lta bu ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
158b5('bum): sha ti'i bu nyi ma'i dus kyi ma'i tshon byeng phyogs kyi che der byang chub sems pa'i theg po po'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni mang du 'byung ste/ shAr de'i bu byang chub sems papa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
158b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i che/ mi 'dzum yongasu mi 'dzum/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mang ngo // de ci'i phyi zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 
158b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po rjes su 'brang ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu me de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po yongs su zhus yongs su
158b8('bum): dris pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang pa yongs
159a1('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu nga rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol kyi sbyin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ rigs kyi rgyu gas kyi du ma da ni ts+tsha
159a2('bum): tha tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu po de dag ni nul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa'i
159a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
159a4('bum): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang ri gas kyi bu mo de dag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs
159a5('bum): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro/ rigs kyi bu dang ni gas kyi bu mo de dag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su
159a6('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'dus sa byas stong panyid yongs su
159a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu klu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo drag de dag ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
159a8('bum): nyid yongs sa su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dor ba stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs
159b1('bum): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu sde de dag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi chu dang sdigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
159b2('bum): 'gyuraro/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni myi rgyu stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa/ gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ rigs
159b3('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / 
159b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu ro// rig sA kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang dag par spong ba yod su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
159b5('bum): dag ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu/ rang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stobs
159b6('bum): yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chu ba kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su
159b7('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu dang / 
159b8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs myed par 'a snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
160a1('bum): de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mthard kyis gnas pa'i gongs par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rig
160a2('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par
160a3('bum): 'gyur ro// rigs bla dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs
160a4('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'a gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo/ 
160a5('bum): de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byams pa chen po yod/ sa su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
160a6('bum): mo de dag ni snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu da rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi
160a7('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba brta nad par 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye po mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltararaM sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu
160a8('bum): rang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ngas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i spyatam brjod do// 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung gi
160b1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gtam brjod de/ de dag kyang che 'das nas 'dis lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
160b2('bum): kyi don tu spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de dag gzhan la yang 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du rnam pa de lta bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro/ sha ri dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
160b3('bum): mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las zlog par myi nus na bdud sdig tol mos pa dang / sdig to'i spyod pa can shes rab
160b4('bum): pha rol tu phyi nang pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gzhan lta ci smos/ sha ra dadwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi sa mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas
160b5('bum): dga' zhing nyams bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyuraro// 'di ltar bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po yang dag ba'i chos la dgod par 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
160b6('bum): bu mo de dag gi mdun du 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub
160b7('bum): tu dgod par 'gyur/ yang dag par snyan par bgyi'o// yang dag par skul bar bgyi'o// yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o// phyir myi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig
160b8('bum): smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la sems kyis rnam par bltas te/ ngas rjes su dges par mdzad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
161a1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang
161a2('bum): srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par skul bar bgyi'o// yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag par
161a3('bum): dga' bar bgyi'o// phyir myi ldog par lung bstand par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gyis kyang rigs kyi
161a4('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rigs dang sems la thugs kyis rnam par gzigs te/ rjes su dges par mdzad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
161a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phragamang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu da gong bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par stond par 'gyur ro/ yong / 
161a6('bum): dag par skul bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par gzengs spyod par 'gyur ro// yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par lung ston dpar lung ston par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang
161a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la mos pa rlabs po cher 'gyur te/ de dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa rlabs po che btang zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byed
161a8('bum): par 'gyur ro// de dag dge ba'i rtsa brlabs po che mngon par 'du byas nas/ rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bdag rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongasu bzung nas sems can de dag nyid kyi dan
161b1('bum): tu rnam par smin pa rlabs po che las/ de bas kyang ches rlabs po che'i rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar byi 'am nang gi dngos pa de dag kyang sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur
161b2('bum): te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par sa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
161b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyid chos stond pa mngon du gyur da pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag la rte nang par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams la
161b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang bzang mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du yang / srog chags brgya drag mang po dang / sro ga chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang / 
161b5('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par stonang par 'gyur ro// yang dag par skul bar 'gyu ro// yang dag par ga/ zeng bstod par 'gyur ro/ yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ 
161b6('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rna chos rnams las gang thug su ma chud pa de lta bu gang
161b7('bum): yang ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid dang thugs su ma rung ba de la bu gang ma mchiso// sems can rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chudang ba de lta bu yang mamachis pa ni ngo tsho ste/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems
161b8('bum): rnams cad yongs sum byed to// ras ma zhin gnags pa rnams kyang yongs sum byed te/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / chos tan rnams pang 'angos kyim khyedan tu/ 
162a1('bum): ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyend to/ ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongasu mkhyen te/ 
162a2('bum): tha/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// 8/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa / 
162a3('bum): rgyus gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho ste pa dang / chos ston pa'i de bani na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mkhyen te/ sangs rgyas
162a4('bum): kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyend to// bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyi nang pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing / pha rol/ 
162a5('bum): tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang / yongasu tshol ba'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang / yongs su tshol ba las pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag thob par/ 
162a6('bum): 'gyur/ la las ni thob par myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de lta ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus mi gtong ba de dag kun kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin/ 
162a7('bum): phyind pa drug po 'di dag thams cad grub par 'gyuraro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ga ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag gi don du brtson par byed para'i phyir ro// gsol pa
162b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi mdo sde zab mo pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i de dag 'grub par myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas skabs myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i
162b2('bum): bu de ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dpa' can rnams yang dag par ston cing yang dag par skul ba dang / yang dag par gzeng stong pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang / 'god
162b3('bum): cing rab tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag grub par 'gyur ro// de dag ni nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
162b4('bum): dag par ma byas sems can yongs su smid par ma byas/ blan skye nga ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyu ring gi bar du ji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol / 
162b5('bum): shes rabam po/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das
162b6('bum): 'dis cos gsal to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang / gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa/ pa ri ladu tu phyind pa drug la steng ba sems
162b7('bum): can yongs su smin par byed pa/ sangs rjes kyi zhing mangs su 'dzi dang pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags no// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dran nga
163a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu stong pa dag gin cang du 'gyur ba dzi bu dag mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ rang 'argya stongs pa tamang ma gyi ni skyen/ khyor rje
163a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cag lci ste skye bar 'gyur// de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen / 
163a3('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ 
163a4('bum): pa dka' bar yongasu rdzogs par byed/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dka' bar yong su rdzogs par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da ka' ba yongasu rdzogs par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' ba yong
163a5('bum): rdzogs par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rolapa tu phyin pa dka' ba yongasu rdzogs par byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongasu rdzogs par byed na// nA grangs des shin tu phye ste/ spangs pa skye bar 'gyur/ 
163a6('bum): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su ri ga par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' seMs
163a7('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa da
163a8('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i dzi/ thabs mi mkhas pas ho \u0f7f sku
163b1('bum): la bas kyi skye la des rlom sem su byed na/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na sabs paha cang myur bar skye ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// rab byor gnanasang grad cing shes/ 
163b2('bum): rab kyi pha rom tu phyinapa 'di 'drin/ rab 'dur de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor rgod cing sprin dang 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa na
163b3('bum): kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor pa ma tshun sdig cing 'dren rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyis su rig par bya'i/ sems g.ye 'drin de yang byang chub sems dpa' ses
163b4('bum): chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// yi ge gzhan la chags shi dang tshig gi don mi shes par 'dri na rab 'byor de yang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// 'di'i ram
163b5('bum): myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub se sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// te rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mus
163b6('bum): kyi lasu rig par bya'o// glang cing kha don du byed dam 'dzin tam/ glog gam ston tam glad cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
163b7('bum): gzhan yang phan tshun rgod ning 'dzid tam/ 'chang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed dam tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o rang 'byor/ 
163b8('bum): gzhan yang phan tshun steg cing 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gis kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yod la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor ga na/ 
164a1('bum): yang sems g.yeng bas 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed na/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang
164a2('bum): yi ge gzhan dang gzhan la chags shing 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bkas
164a3('bum): stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol d+haH/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du ram myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor de sang byang chub sems dpa
164a4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// zhes bka' la na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ro myi myong bar 'gyur bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub ses/ 
164a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po son shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bas ma gtan gi pha ral tu phyind pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha ral/ 
164a6('bum): phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin po 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan to zhes ma dad pa'i yid kyis stan/ 
164a7('bum): las langs shing 'dong ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lung du ma bstan pa de dag
164a8('bum): las langs shing 'chi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon myed par ma chud par ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyab tu lung mi da
164b1('bum): de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las myi 'byung ngo // bdag gi mying yang yongasu ma brjod do// zhes dad par ma gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// 
164b2('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mying yongasu ma brjod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor
164b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstand pa rnams kyi mying ni yongs su ma brjod de/ de la bdag gi mying yang 'di las myi 'byung bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal gi mying ya/ 
164b4('bum): myi 'byung ngo zhes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi nyan no snyam byed cing 'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na/ sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing gom pa ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi skal ba yong su 'dzin par
164b5('bum): 'gyur te/ de dag la bzod pa brtson 'grus brtsam dgos so// de she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bor zhing mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongasu myi 'grub pa de dag kun chub par
164b6('bum): bya bar sems te des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te de nyid kyi yal ga dang 'dab ma dang lo
164b7('bum): la 'dzum par sems par gyur pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs myi
164b8('bum): 'grub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyid par sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am reng srungs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste/ 'di ltar dran pa nyeb
165a1('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
165a2('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa rnams te de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid
165a3('bum): thob pa dang rang byang chub thob par 'gyur gyi/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par myi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa por zhing
165a4('bum): kun chub par bya bar sems pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongasu mi sgrub pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las
165a5('bum): byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin/ pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas ni 'jig rten
165a6('bum): ba dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams skyob pa yin no// rab tu ra 'di lta ste dper na/ khyi la la ni jo bo'i zan nar ma bor te las mi los zan btsal bar sems pa de dang 'dra bar de bzhin du rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i du
165a7('bum): na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres bkyim par 'gyur ba 'di bor te yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma lta bu can thos / 
165a8('bum): sangs rgyas dang mdag la brtan par sems pa 'thung ste/ rang 'byor de yang bya chu moms dpa' sems dpang tsho bas bdud kyilasu rig par byag/ rang 'gyi dga'ad sangs 'ongs pa dus na byang chub ses
165b1('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi nu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di'or nas khye dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mang kyi rnams kur chung par rlu ra sems pabyung ste/ 
165b2('bum): 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na mi la la glang po 'dod pa des glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes nas btsal bar sems pa yod na rab 'byor/ 
165b3('bum): de ji snyam du sems skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pothig po na
165b4('bum): gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha ri mang tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems dpa' dag kyang dpe'i de dang 'dra bar bya ste// rab 'byor de yang byang cur
165b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen zas bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'dis ste dper na mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta bar 'dod nang lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing des pa lang gi rjes mthong nas
165b6('bum): 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po'i cheng 'di dang mnyam 'am mi mnyam snyam na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa
165b7('bum): don ma mgoso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha ri lang tu phyin pa lab mo 'ad mas shing rnyed kya
165b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang bzung ba dang kun chub par bya bar sems te de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste rab 'byor de yang byang chub
166a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na phya mkhan nam phya mkhan gi slob ma rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa zhig dbub cing slab par 'dod
166a2('bum): nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang yongasu btsal bar sems shing nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang gi tshad blang bar sems na/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang gi tshad kyis rna bar
166a3('bum): rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe'i tshul bzung ste/ de dang 'dra ba'i khang pa dbub par nus sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems phya mkhanan
166a4('bum): phya mkhan gi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam gsol pa bco ma ldan 'das skyes bu de ni mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can du rig par bya'o/ mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
166a5('bum): stsal pa rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems pa pa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la shes ra ba kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang shes ra
166a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu btsal ba sems pa/ 'byung ni/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems byang chub sos
166a7('bum): dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
166a8('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dri lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas
166b1('bum): 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khu dog dang dbyings ci 'dra ba zhig yod ces des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang dbyings dang tshul dang mtshan ma bzung bar bsams te 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal ba'i
166b2('bum): kha dog dang dbyibs dang tshul dang mtshan ma yang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig yod grang zhes zer na rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i dang rgyal man yin nam gsol ba bcom ldan 'das don mi lags/ bden
166b3('bum): gshegs pa de ni ma lag so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
166b4('bum): pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongasu btsal bar sems
166b5('bum): pa byung ni/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg ba pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul da can yin nam gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag s+ho// bcom
166b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la la zhig gis ro brgya dang ldan
166b7('bum): pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang / zhag drug cu'i kha zas btsal bar sems shing de kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas/ drug cu'i kha zas bza' bar bsams nas/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
166b8('bum): can yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab
167a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu btsal bar
167a2('bum): sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor da ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
167a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che rin thang myed pa rnyed nas/ nor bu 'ching bu dang / 
167a4('bum): bskrund par bsams na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mangs pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsalang pa bcom ldan 'das don ram lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de rje ste
167a5('bum): du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di/ 
167a6('bum): zeng zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu btsal ba sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyis
167a7('bum): dang rigs kyi bum de dag mkhas pa'i ring tshul can yin nam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la
167a8('bum): rig par bya'o// rab kyang gzhanas rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi nu ba shes rab kyi ma tu phyid pa 'ab ma 'di 'dri ba che/ sabs pa mang po gang gis shes dgro pa meng tu byind pa zas ma 'dri bar bkrugs mar 'gyu / 
167b1('bum): de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi spobs pa dang sgra'i spobs pa dang dri'i spongs pa dang ro'i spobs pa dang reg gi spobs pa dang / chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi spobs pa dang // 
167b2('bum): bzod pa'i spongs pa dang brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gi spobs pa dang shes rab kyi spongs pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi
167b3('bum): spobs pa dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha don du bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim 'gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang yang dag par spong ba'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang dbang po
167b4('bum): spobs pa dang stobs kyi spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang / lam gi spobs pa dang bsam gtan gi spobs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i spobs pa dang ting nge 'dzind kyi spobs pa dang / snyoms par
167b5('bum): 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / gnang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang chen po stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa/ 
167b6('bum): dang / dad dam pasong pa nyid kyi spongs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis sa pa dang dus ma byas stong po nyid kyi stobs pa dang / mtha' lasa'i ngas pa stong pa nyid kyi stobs pa dang / thog ma da su ma med pa sto
167b7('bum): sa pa dang / deng bskyed pa dang pa nyid kyi stobs pa dang / rang banyid stong banyid kyi sgribs pa dang / nas rnams cad stong panyid kyi sa pa dang / rang ni mtsha nyid stong ba nyid kyi mabyas pa dang / myid migs pa sto
167b8('bum): 'i/ rjem 'i sring pa grong zhi kyi byas pa dang / ngag nga nyid kyi srings pa dang / sa babyed pa'i jig ming tu dzim pa dang / sbyi pa'i ma ngas phyi pa grongs pongs du
168a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i spobs pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i spobs pa dang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i spobs pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol
168a2('bum): tu phyind pa'i spobs pa dang // stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang myi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i spobs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / 
168a3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa
168a4('bum): skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni spobs pa myed pas rnam par byang ba'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// rab 'byor shes rab
168a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sems pa myed pa'o// rab 'byor de shes ra rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni skye ba myed pa ni 'gag pa myed pa'o// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa rna bar byang
168a6('bum): ba myed pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'khru ga pa myed pa'o// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni brjod du med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba myed pa'o// rang
168a7('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmyigs su myed pa'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la myed cing myi dmyigs te/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg/ 
168a8('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ chos de dag 'khrug par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i ni kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu ma de dag gi bdud ki la buM
168b1('bum): rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
168b2('bum): rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigaso// brtson
168b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigaso// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phand pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigaso// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigaso// sprin/ 
168b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigaso// phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigaso// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod/ 
168b5('bum): ma yin te myi dmyig so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod ma yin te myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yi rten te myi dmyigaso/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs
168b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigaso/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tham
168b7('bum): myeng pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyig so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngan/ 
168b8('bum): nyid mong pa ma yin te myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma nyid yod pa ma yin te phyir myig so// myi dmyigs po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid yong ba ma yin te/ myi dmyigs dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kying ba nyid yod ba ma mis
169a1('bum): myi dmyig so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyig so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyig so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ 
169a2('bum): myi dmyig so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigaso/ dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyig so// stobs rnam
169a3('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyig so/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngos
169a4('bum): nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigaso// tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma nga yin te myi dmyig so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
169a5('bum): yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo dang yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i// snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs// rna ba
169a6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa'i ngom nyid yod pa ma yin ta myi dmyigaso// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigaso/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin/ 
169a7('bum): myi dmyigs/ gdus kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo ba nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs rnams kyi ngo ba nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs/ skyo 'jigs pa rnams kyi nga shing ya pa ma yinan phyi dbyigs
169a8('bum): sos yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi nga bo nyid yod pa ma yin te phyi myog so// snying chen po ba nyid yong ba sa yin te phyir myigs/ sangs rgyas kyichos ma 'dres pa rnams kying ba nyid yod ba ma yin te/ myi dmyig so// thams ca ma
169b1('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs/ lam gi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid myi dmyigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos go
169b2('bum): myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ dngos po myed pas dngos po myed pa bri bar myi nus so// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi
169b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di dngos po myed ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed na/ de yang bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes
169b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas shes rab/ kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di dag gis bris so// zhes mchi na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te/ 
169b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yi ger ma mchis pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yi ger ma mchis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ger ma mchis pa'o// 
169b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni yi ger ma mchis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yi ger ma mchis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ger ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis
169b7('bum): tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myig ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna ni yi ge ma mchi
169b8('bum): pa'o// lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sgra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dr-i ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ro ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
170a1('bum): reg ni yi ge ma mchis ra'o/ chos ni zhi ge ma mchis pag/ myig gi rnam par shes pan mi gas mtshas pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o snga'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge mam
170a2('bum): pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o rna ba'i
170a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi
170a4('bum): ge ma mchis pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge mal mchis pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yi ge/ 
170a5('bum): ma mchis pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni
170a6('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sa khams ni yi ge ma mchis d+ha'o// chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// me'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// nam mkha'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pam
170a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ma rig pa na yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mying dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// skye mched drug ni
170a8('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o// reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sred pa ni yo ge ma mchis pa'o// len pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// srid pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa lo skyo ba ni yi ge me mchis pa'o na shi ni yig/ 
170b1('bum): ma mchis pra'o// nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
170b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
170b3('bum): nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa
170b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyi dad ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dran pa nye
170b5('bum): bzhag pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yo / ma mchis pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa 'o// dbang po rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o stobs rnams ni yi ge ma
170b6('bum): mchis pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni yi ge ma mamI
170b7('bum): ba'o tshad med pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge
170b8('bum): ma mchis pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnas ni yi
171a1('bum): ge ma mchis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// myi 'jigs pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma/ 
171a2('bum): mchis pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid ni yi rtsal gem mchis pa'o// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yi ge ma/ 
171a3('bum): mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan
171a4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par bgyid cing yi ge ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa 'am/ yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par
171a5('bum): chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin de pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / 
171a6('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i ning stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / mig ma mchis par bya stong pa nyid la mngon par rags par dbyed pa dang / yi ges mchis pa'i phyinang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / 
171a7('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa
171a8('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
171b1('bum): nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed pa dang yi ge ma mchi/ 
171b2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyi dpa
171b3('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par
171b4('bum): chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ngongos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang // yi ge ma mchis pa/ 'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed do// 
171b5('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par ba gyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la ma ngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dbang po
171b6('bum): rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge mchis/ 
171b7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brkyang ba rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bded pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la mngon par
171b8('bum): chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad myed pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i
172a1('bum): rnam par tha rad pa rnams la mngon par chags pa byeng nga/ yi ge ma mchis pa'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par chags pa gyad pa/ yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
172a2('bum): ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / 
172a3('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i myi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon
172a4('bum): par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sang sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par chags par bgyid par
172a5('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyi da pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams ca
172a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang // de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te rab 'byor dgazhan
172a7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha don byed pa dang / zhu ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yi
172a8('bum): byed pa dang sgom pa'i tshe/ yul gi yid la bya ba mang po bskyed na rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs / 
172b1('bum): bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang kha don byed pa dang / zhu ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang sgom pa'i tshe/ grong gi yid la bya ba dang grong rdal/ 
172b2('bum): gyi yid la bya ba dang / khams kyi yid la bya ba dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang / khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang bla ma dang mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang pha dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang phu nu dang
172b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang sring mo dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / rkun po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang phyag dar ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ 
172b4('bum): dang / smad 'tshong ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bud myed dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skye na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang 'chang ba dang klog
172b5('bum): pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i tshe/ bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyurapa nye bar sbyor te/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
172b6('bum): bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ khye dang bkur bsti dang tshig su bcad pa dang chos twa/ 
172b7('bum): dang zas dang mal cha dang nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po byung la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'gro pa dang kha don byed pa dang tshul
172b8('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i tshe de dag gi ro myong bar byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog par
173a1('bum): kha don byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i tshe bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byorard gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha/ 
173a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang bsgom pa'i tshe bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo zab mo gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
173a3('bum): dang ldan pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
173a4('bum): pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dag nye bar ste nad par byed de/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas bdud kyis
173a5('bum): bsten pa'i mdo sde de dag la 'dod pa myi skyed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed/ pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs myi mkhas
173a6('bum): pa dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems te/ de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa rgya cher bstan te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
173a7('bum): las kyang thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bor zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs
