173a8('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// 
173b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// / shes rab bam po / rab 'byorang gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shre
173b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha don bya bar dga' la chos smra ba ni phyi shol byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
173b3('bum): gzhan yang chos smra ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don bya bar myi shol myi byed na chos nyan pa ni yul gzhan du 'gro na rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ 
173b4('bum): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don du bya bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni yul gzhan du 'gro na rab 'byor de yang
173b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni khye dang bkur sti dang tshig su bcad pa lhur len cing gos dang zas dang mal cha dang nad kyi rkyen
173b6('bum): rtsi dang yo byad lhur len la chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi g.yeng ba sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste khye dang
173b7('bum): bkur stis 'jigs na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
173b8('bum): bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus rtsams pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi g.yeng ba sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa shes rab dang lda/ 
174a1('bum): zhig ste khye dang bkur stis 'jigs la chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa che zhing sdig to 'dod la/ khye dang bkur sti dang tshigasu bcad pa lhur len cing gos dang zas dang mal cha dang nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad lhur len na rab 'byor/ 
174a2('bum): de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gnas
174a3('bum): yang chos smra ba ni dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa phyag dar khrod pa zas phyis myi len pa/ stan cig pa ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa dur khrod pa bla gab myed pa/ shing drung pa cog pu pa gzhi ji bzhin pa chos gos gsum par
174a4('bum): gyur la chos nyan pa ni dgon pa ma yin bsod snyoms pa ma yin/ phyag/ dar khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis myi len pa ma yin/ stan cig pa ma yin ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin dur khrod pa ma yin/ 
174a5('bum): bla gab myed pa ma yin shing drung ba ma yin/ cog pu pa ma yin/ gzhi ji bzhi na pa ma yinate/ chos gsum pa ma yin/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don ste
174a6('bum): pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa phyag dar khrod pa zas phyis myi len pa stan
174a7('bum): cig pa ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa dur khrod pa bla gang myed pa/ shing drung pa cog pu pa/ gzhi ji bzhin pa chos gos gsum par gyur pa chos smra ba ni dgod pa pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin phyag dar khrod pa
174a8('bum): ma yin/ zas phyis myi len pa ma yin/ stan cig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab myed pa ma yin shing drung pa ma yin cog pu pa ma yin gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin chos gos/ 
174b1('bum): gsum pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms phyis myi len pa ma yin na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems
174b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dad cing bsam pa dge la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dra bar 'dod lung nod par 'dod kha don bya bar 'dod la chos
174b3('bum): smra ba ni ma dad pa/ tshul khrims ngan pa can sdig pa'i chos can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bri bar 'dod/ lung 'bog par myi 'dod kha don byed par myi 'dod na de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bri bra
174b4('bum): dang lug 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dad cing bsam pa dge la shes rab
174b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bri bar 'dod lung 'bog par 'dod kha do// na bya bar 'dod/ chos nyan pa ni ma dang na rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha da
174b6('bum): byed pa'i rgyu rkyend myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa 'i sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dge zhan yang chos smra ba ni bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong zhing sems la/ 
174b7('bum): chags pa myed la chos can pa ni ser sna can chags sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab
174b8('bum): 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bdog pa thams cad yong su gtong zhing sems la chags pa myed na chos smra ba ni ser sna can chags som
175a1('bum): dang ldan pa zhing 'jungs par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'gog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dbe'u
175a2('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba la gos dang zas dang mal cha dang nad kyi rkyenang rtsi dang yo byad yongasu gtong bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni len par mi 'dod na rab 'byor da de yang
175a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dgas
175a4('bum): yang chos smra ba ni glengs pa tsam gyis shes la chos nyan pa ni bkri dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur da na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang khwa don
175a5('bum): rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni glengs pa tsam gyis shes la chos smra ba ni// 
175a6('bum): dgos shing / tshig lhur len par 'gyur na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don du byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
175a7('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis snyan pa dang / lung du bstand pa dang / tshig su bcad pa dang ched du brjod pa dang gleng bzhi dang 'di ltar 'das pa dang skyes
175a8('bum): rabs dang shin tu rgyas pa dang chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs par brjod pa dang / gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la chos nyan pa ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis snang pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang tshig su bca
175b1('bum): dang ched du brjod pa gleng gzhi dang 'di ltar 'das pa dang skyes pa'i rabs dang shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / brtan la phab par bstand pa'i chos kyi khyad par myi shes na rab 'byor dados/ 
175b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ba dang kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
175b3('bum): yang chos nyan pa ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis snyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang tshig su bcad pa dang ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang skyes pa'i rabs dang shin tu rgyas pa dang chos rmad du byung ba dang rtogs pa
175b4('bum): brjod pa dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/ chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis snyad pa dang lung du snangan pa dang / tshig su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang gleng gzhi dang 'di ltar 'dra
175b5('bum): pa dang skyes pa'i rabs dang shin tu rgyas pa dang chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang rten la phab par bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par myi shes na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
175b6('bum): zab mo 'dri 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa 'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos
175b7('bum): smra ba ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan la/ chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang myi ldan na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don
175b8('bum): rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan la chos smra
176a1('bum): phyind pa drug dang myi ldan na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
176a2('bum): chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mkhas pa la chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs myi mkhas na/ rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi / 
176a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni/ 
176a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa drug la thabs mkhas la/ chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug la thabs mi mkhas na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang / 
176a5('bum): kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gzungs thob par gyur la/ chos nyan pa/ 
176a6('bum): ni gzungs ma thab na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi
176a7('bum): las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gzungs thob par gyur pa la/ chos smra ba ni gzungs ma thob na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed
176a8('bum): pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni bri bar 'dod bklag par 'dod lung 'bog par 'dod kha don byed par 'dod/ 
176b1('bum): bsgom par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni bri bar 'dod bklag par 'dod / lung 'jog par myi 'dod kha don byed par gyi 'dod mnyan par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ab ma 'ad 'dra ba dang rung / 
176b2('bum): 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni bri bar 'dod klag par 'dod lung
176b3('bum): 'bog par 'dod kha don bya bar 'dod mnyan par 'dod la chos smra ba ni bri bar 'dod/ klag par 'dod lung 'bog par mi 'dod kha don bya bar myi 'dod/ bsgom par myi 'dod par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
176b4('bum): phyi nad pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi lnga na pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang rlo
176b5('bum): smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral gnod sems dang bral snyom pa dang gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang bral the tsom dang bral la chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i srid pa dang bcas gnod sems dang snyom pa dang gnyid dang 'gyod pa/ 
176b6('bum): dang bcas the tsom dang bcas par gyur dan/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i sgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' som
176b7('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bral gnod sems dang snyom pa dang gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang / the tsom dang bral chos smra ba ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang
176b8('bum): gnod sems dang snyom pa dang gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang bcas the tsom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ 
177a1('bum): rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa/ 
177a2('bum): dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe la la zhig der 'ongs te/ sems can dmyal ba'i myi snyan pa brjod/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig
177a3('bum): rten dang yi rigs kyi yul la mi snyan pa brjod cing sems can dmyal ba pa ni sdug bsngal lo// byol song gi skye gnas ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal/ yi dgas kyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo// khyod kyis sdug snga
177a4('bum): 'di nyid du mthar phyin par gyis shig/ gang la sdug bsngal mang po ste dang phrag mang po nyam su myong bar 'gyur ba'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya khyod ni yun ri/ 
177a5('bum): bor 'khor ba nas 'khor bar gyur da ta re zhes zer na rab 'byor de yang naM sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa da nga kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste rab 'byor de yang byang chub
177a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'dog pa dang kha don byed pa dang 'chang ba dang tshul bzhin
177a7('bum): du yid la byed pa'i tshe la la zhig der 'ongs te rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod namatsha ma'i lha rnam gi legs pa brjod dga' ldan gi legs pa
177a8('bum): brjod 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod tshangasas
177b1('bum): kun 'khor gi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs chen gi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs
177b2('bum): ba brjod kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod chung dge'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs/ 
177b3('bum): pa brjod che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs
177b4('bum): pa brjod mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi leg sa pa brjod 'og myin gi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod nam mkha'
177b5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod 'du shes
177b6('bum): med 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ cing mdod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o// gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ni 'di// 
177b7('bum): ltar bde'o// gzugs myed pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa zhi ba rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste/ de dag kyang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag myed do// rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can zad pa'i chos can 'jig pa'i
177b8('bum): chos can skye ba'i chos can 'gag pa'i chos can yin gis 'di nyid du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig/ 
178a1('bum): 'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig/ phyin chad mi 'khor ba na ma 'khor bar gyis shig ces zer na rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu
178a2('bum): rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla ba myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin la chos nyan pa
178a3('bum): 'khor gi nang du gnas na/ rab 'byor de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
178a4('bum): bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa da ni gcig pu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin la chos smra ba ni 'khor gi nang na gnas na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
178a5('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos/ 
178a6('bum): smra bu ni gcig pu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin la chos nyan pa ni tshogs yongasu sdu na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi
178a7('bum): ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa myed pa yin la chos sprus/ 
178a8('bum): ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bas
178b1('bum): bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'di skad du su nga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa 'dir sbyin no zhes zer la chos nyan pa ni phyi bzhin du mi 'brang na rab 'byor pas
178b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'jog pa dang / kha dor byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// rang 'byor dgas/ 
178b3('bum): ya nga da sa sna ba'i byi bzhin tu grang pa 'das chos smra ba'i drung du 'gra ba na pas myi 'byed na/ rab byang yong shes ra kyi chong sbyid pa ngam di ba nga srung pog pa dang 'dod bye rkyen rgya
178b4('bum): ba ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni zang ring cung zad kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha ma du tu phyind pa za mo 'di 'dir
178b5('bum): gzhug par 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par 'dod lung 'bog par 'dod// kha don byed du gzhug par 'dod la chos nyan pa ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir drang du 'gro bar ma mos na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol
178b6('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni tha
178b7('bum): zing cung zad kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bri bar 'dad bklag par 'dod lung 'bog par 'dod kha don bya bar 'dod bsgom par 'dod nyan par 'dod chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
178b8('bum): sbyin par 'dod 'drir gzhug tu myi 'dod lung 'bog tur mi 'dod kha don byed du gzhug par myi 'dod/ bsgom du gzhug par mi 'dod nyan par myi 'dod nyan du gzhug par mi 'dod na rab 'byor da de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
179a1('bum): zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang srog gi
179a2('bum): bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la chos nyan pa ni dor 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste rab 'byor de la
179a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang yang chos nyan pa ni srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na rab 'byor de la/ 
179a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dra ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byord/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byord
179a5('bum): gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas dkon pa dang / gang na chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod na/ chos nyan pa ni 'gro bar 'gro bar myi 'dod/ na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / 
179a6('bum): nga lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ma ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang zas dkon pa dang chu dkon pa'i phyog/ 
179a7('bum): der 'gro bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rangab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sas
179a8('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas mod pa dang chu mod pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod na/ chos nyan pa yang rje su 'drang na des de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod zang zing gi don du so/ 
179b1('bum): ste ci rung / legs par bsam pa sems par gyis shig/ zas thob ma thob dang gsod mi gsod kyis 'gyod par gyur pa ta re zhes zer na/ de'i phyir chos ston pa des kyang thabs phra mos chos spang bar 'gyur te/ de yang mi 'ga'
179b2('bum): zhig 'di snyam du 'du shes te/ 'di ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ma yin gyi spong ba'i mtshan ma yin no snyam na/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa/ 
179b3('bum): ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni gang na rkun pos 'jigs pa dang chom pos 'jigs pa dang rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / 
179b4('bum): gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang sbrul gi 'jigs pa dang 'brog dgon pa'i 'ji dgas pa yod pa der 'gro bar 'dod la chos nyan pa dag kyang chos kyi do na du chos kyis sgom zhing rjesu 'brang na dge slong chos smra bas chos nyan
179b5('bum): de dag la 'di skad smras te/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang sbrul gis 'jigs pa dang 'bog dgon dri
179b6('bum): 'jigs pa yod pa der dong ste ci rung zhes zer de ltar dge slong chos smra ba des chos mi snyan pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'drir gzhug par myi 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par myi 'dod lung 'bog par myi 'dod
179b7('bum): kha don byed du gzhug par mi 'dod par gyur la de dag gis dge slong chas smra ba'i tshig de thos nas mi dga' zhing mi dga' ba'i tshul can du 'gyur te/ dge slong chos smra ba der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha
179b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba
180a1('bum): dang ba rnams gtong ba'i slob byed gan par byed par zhu ste/ des so gangs gtu krung rgya ga par gyur pas pasod stongs gtong ba'i grong khyer de dgas dang mang+yas sangs so// 
180a2('bum): der yang dang yang basnrubs chos nyan pa'i phyir zlog tsa ma dang ston pa dag ngas ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer bsgra dgos te/ bsod stonas gtong ba'i grong du 'gro dgesas/ nas nas nges chos rten pa de dan phyi/ 
180a3('bum): pa'i phyir 'dod na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha 'o sang tu phyid pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ngon byed pa'i myi rkyen mi smin pa ste/ rab 'byor de sang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che pos du
180a4('bum): kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dgazhan yang bdud srog tonan ge slong gi ma byang du byas shing ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rolapa tu dadri nid pa zab mo 'ong su yang 'dri bar myi 'gyu ra ba dang lung 'bog par myi
180a5('bum): 'gyur ba dang kha don byed par myi 'gyur ba dang tshul bzhin du yid la/ byed par myi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ro// de skad ces pa ka' stsal pa dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
180a6('bum): skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slang du 'dung sdig tanan dag dgi sang gi ni byang du 'dis shing cinas kyang// shes rab kyi pa ros thaM zab mo 'di su ya 'dri bar myi 'gyur ba dang sung 'ag par myi gyul
180a7('bum): ba dang kha dor byed par myi 'gyur ba dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par mi 'gyur ba deste de ltar thabs sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la bdud sdig can dag dge slong gi cha byang du
180a8('bum): byas shing 'di skad du byas zer zhing 'di skad du nged kyis ji ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di yin te ji skad du khyed klog pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// zhes dben zhes byed cing
180b1('bum): zlog la mos pa myed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de de la bdud sdig to can gis de ltar dben byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stand pa de dag ni the tsom skye bar 'gyur te de dag the tsom du gyur nas shes
180b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri bar 'gyur/ mi glog par 'gyur/ lung mi 'bog par 'gyur/ kha don byed par myi 'gyur/ mi sgom par 'gyur tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dgezhwa
180b3('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor/ 
180b4('bum): gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs shing 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
180b5('bum): phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed par/ 'gyur te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra
180b6('bum): bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// de ni rang byang chub thob por 'gyur zhes nor na des tshig de thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brang sa
180b7('bum): 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste rab 'byor de yang zhe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
180b8('bum): pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ bar chad du 'gyur ba'i las bdud kyi las mang du bya ste/ bdud kyi las de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rig par byas nas spang bar bya'o// 
181a1('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bgyi
181a2('bum): ma pa kyi ba ga gas/ pam ldanams kyis pa/ rlomapa/ kya sa kyi da pa mas parnyan ni chud kyis/ ras byor bsam gargyan shA na sung
181a3('bum): rab 'byor nga brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byorang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa na ba dang / 
181a4('bum): gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu nad pa'i gzugs rnyan ni bdud kyi las te/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam par spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor
181a5('bum): gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa da nga ldan pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rig par bya ste/ rnam par spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan ya
181a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
181a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang thog ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang dngos po myed pa stong pa ni
181a8('bum): dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
181b1('bum): dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa gang gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyi
181b2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
181b3('bum): dpa' chen po la nye bar bsten te/ de yang de la dga' ba bskyed na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mo ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub
181b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor du gzhan yang budud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du lus gse dar gi kha dog dang mo chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang 'od 'don
181b5('bum): gang bar ldan par byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drungadu/ 'ongs te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma sa pa bskyed do// des mos pa bskyed nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
181b6('bum): pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de yang shes rab kyi pha re lang tu phyind pa zab mo 'od 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan po ste rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
181b7('bum): chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas las stsogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun nye bar ston te/ des de la 'dod pa skyed ci
181b8('bum): bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur shog shig/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis tshogs yong su sdud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshogs
182a1('bum): yong su sdud par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di chos ji ltar ston pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos ston par bya'o zhes de de la 'dod pa skyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las yong su nyams par 'gyur/ 
182a2('bum): rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rang
182a3('bum): 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag du ma/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pharo// 
182a4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
182a5('bum): de lta bu dag nye bar stond te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg ba pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'dod pa skyed pa ra 'gyur ro// de dag la 'dod pa skyed nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid
182a6('bum): phas yong su nyams par 'gyu / rab byor da yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu nad pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'brog pa dang kha don byed pa dang ban+de ma pa dang tshul bzhin du yod la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rangab 'byor des
182a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da ci'i phyir na no// shes rab kyi pha ro mang tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gzugs myed do tshor ba myed do// 'du shes myed do 'du byed do rnam par skye
182a8('bum): pa myed do// myig myed do/ rna ba med do// sa myed do lce myed do lus myed do// yid myed do// gzugs myed sgra myed do// dri med do/ ro myed do reg myed do chos myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa myed do/ rna ba'i rna par shes pa myed do/ 
182b1('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed do yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do lce'i 'dus
182b2('bum): te reg pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshar ba myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshar
182b3('bum): myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// sa'i khams myed do chu'i khams myed do ma'i khas myed/ 
182b4('bum): rlung gi khams myed do// nam mkha'i khams med do// rnam par she sa pa'i khams myed do// ma rig pa myed do 'du byed myed do rnam par she/ ngas pa myed do// mying dang gzugs myed do skye mched drug myed de rig pa myed do// 
182b5('bum): tshor ba myed do// sred pa myed do len pa myed do// srid pa med do skye ba myed do rga shi myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ 
182b6('bum): myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid myed do phyi stong pa nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed/ 
182b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed do// chen po stong pa nyid myed do don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed do mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myo
182b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid med dado/ dor bamyed pa stong pa nyid med do// rang banin stong pa nyid myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed do dngos po myed pa nga/ 
183a1('bum): nyid myed de/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams myed do rdzu 'phrul gi nang ba rnams/ 
183a2('bum): myed do// dbang po rnams yod do/ stobs rnams myed do// byang chub kyi yon lag rnams myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed do/ bsam gtan rnams myed do tshad myed pa
183a3('bum): rnams myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// rnam par thar pa brgyad myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyomarmas par 'jug pa dgu med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed/ 
183a4('bum): pa dang smon pa myed pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams/ myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myed do mi 'jigs pa myed do so so
183a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi myed do// byams pa chen po myed do// snying rje chen po myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bamo brgya da myed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bru
183a6('bum): bu myed do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid med do/ rang byang chub myed do// lam gi rnam pa shis pa nyid myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed do// rab 'byor gang la gzugs myed/ 
183a7('bum): pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyon thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas mye
183a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' byed do// rangasangs rgyas myed do/ nyan thos byed do/ decor phyiyi na na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang ma du shes myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa na
183b1('bum): rangasangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed/ datso 'phyim ne na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ring bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la 'du byed med pa des sangs rgyas myed de/ byang chu ba sems dpa' byed do/ rang sangs rgyas skyed/ 
183b2('bum): nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed donyan thos kyi
183b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la myig myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas med do/ nyan thos myed da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
183b4('bum): 'byung chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / gang la rdab myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' byeng / darang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed de nga ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor ma / 
183b5('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gis spong ngo // gang la sa myed pa do/ la sangs rgyas byed do// byang chub sems dpa' byed de/ rangs ngas rgyas byed do// na thos myed de de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor chos thas/ 
183b6('bum): cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la lho myed pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da chos thams cad ni rang ba ni/ 
183b7('bum): gyis byung / gang sa lus myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa'i byed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do/ de tso byor nin rar 'byor chos thams cad na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ga
183b8('bum): med byed par mya sangs rgyas byed do// byang chub sems dpa byed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// rgyan pas myod de/ de tsen phyir nas/ rab byor cis mas cad ni rang bzhin gis spang nga/ gang la gzugs
184a1('bum): pade la sangs rgyas myed de/ byang chub sems dpa' byed / rang sangs rgyas skyed do/ nyan pas myed na dam phyi na na/ rab 'byor sa thams cad na nganan zhes snang ngagangs sku skyed par
184a2('bum): sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la dri myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed de byang chub ste// 
184a3('bum): dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la ro myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed de rang sangs
184a4('bum): rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed
184a5('bum): nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos mye
184a6('bum): deci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la chos myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor ni
184a7('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gos stong ngo // gang la myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams sa
184a8('bum): ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la rna ba'i ni myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo gang
184b1('bum): A rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir ne na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong / gang la lce'i rnam par
184b2('bum): shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lus kyi rnam par shes pa byed
184b3('bum): de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sa
184b4('bum): rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas myed/ nyan thos myed de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor nga chos thams cacad ni rang de bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa de la sangs
184b5('bum): rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas mye/ byed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos ji sa cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la rna ba'i 'dus te reg bya de las
184b6('bum): rgyas myed do/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed de nyon thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ 
184b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas med/ byang chub ste/ 
184b8('bum): dpa' med do/ rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' phyin
185a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// 
185a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa'
185a3('bum): myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyon thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub seMs
185a4('bum): dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de la sangs rgyas myed do// 
185a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang ba zhin gis stong ngo // gang la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed
185a6('bum): pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo gang la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
185a7('bum): kyis tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas med de/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do nyan thos myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba med/ 
185a8('bum): del sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gos stong ngo // gang la sa'i khams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// 
185b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la chu'i khams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' sgo
185b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la mye'i khams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myong rang sangs rgyas myed do// 
185b3('bum): nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rlung gi khams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas med do nyan thos myed de ci'i
185b4('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la nam mkha'i khams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed/ nyan thos myed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos
185b5('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' mye/ da do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor da tshwa/ 
185b6('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la ma rig pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
185b7('bum): bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la 'du byed myed pa de ni sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngogang
185b8('bum): la rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong po gang la mying dang gzugs
186a1('bum): myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la skye mched drug myed pa de la
186a2('bum): sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub ses
186a3('bum): dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed/ 
186a4('bum): nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sred pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' mya / rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// 
186a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la 'od bzhin myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe
186a6('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // grang la srid pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos myed de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ra
186a7('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo gang la skye ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de na'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang larga
186a8('bum): shi myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa de la
186b1('bum): sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed pa de las
186b2('bum): rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// 
186b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed// 
186b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor da chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la bsam gtan gi pha rolal tu phyind pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas mye
186b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos/ myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin/ gyis stong ngo // gang la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas
186b6('bum): myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhi na gyis stong ngo // gang la nang stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// 
186b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la phyi stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myedado byang chub sems dpa' me
186b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myedado/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// 
187a1('bum): nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos/ 
187a2('bum): myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la chen po stong pa nyid med pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
187a3('bum): rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos thos
187a4('bum): cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myi da do// nyan thos myed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
187a5('bum): gis stong ngo // gang la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
187a6('bum): stong ngo // gang la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgya sa myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 
187a7('bum): gad+ha la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de mi'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong nga gang la do/ 
187a8('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do/ nyan thos myed dode ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stongango // gang la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed kyi
187b1('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa
187b2('bum): de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas
187b3('bum): myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub
187b4('bum): sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do/ nyan thos myed do de ci de'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems/ 
187b5('bum): dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la dang po myed po stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub ses dpa
187b6('bum): myed/ rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor dade chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa stong pa nyid med pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do nyan thos myed do// 
187b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir/ 
187b8('bum): na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor/ 
188a1('bum): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la yang dag par spong ba rnams med pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed nyan thos myed de de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams / 
188a2('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams myed pa la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong
188a3('bum): gang la dbang po rnams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la stobs rnams myed pa/ 
188a4('bum): de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos mas cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la byang chub kyi yan rnams myed pa/ 
188a5('bum): de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
188a6('bum): brgyad pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam/

188b1('bum): sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed

188b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed nyan thos myed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa skye
188b5('bum): pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da chos/ thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la mngon par shes pa rnams
188b6('bum): myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos tham sa cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la ting nge 'dzin rnams myed pa de la
188b7('bum): sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed
188b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// 
189a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang lnga rlung bzhin myed pa de la sangams rgyas myed do byangacu
189a2('bum): sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myong nga byang chub sos
189a3('bum): dpa' skyed do// rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo gang la snying rje chen po myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do byang chub sems dpa' myong // rang sangs
189a4('bum): rgyas myed do/ nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / gang la sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rnams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed dade/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do rangs
189a5('bum): rgyas myed do// nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor cho das thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i/ 'bras bu myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub ses dpa' myed rangs pa
189a6('bum): rgyas myed do// nyan thos mye do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor rgya/ sa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la lan cig phyir ro/ nga ba'i 'bras bu myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed de byang chub ses dpa' myed do rangs
189a7('bum): rgyus myong / nyan thos myong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dachos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ rang sangs rgyas
189a8('bum): myed do/ nyan thos myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la dgra bcom pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myeng do rang sangs rgyas mye nyan thos myed do// 
189b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang la rang byang chub myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos myed do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byon
189b2('bum): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do// byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas myed do nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de chos
189b3('bum): thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo // // shes rab bam po// / rab 'byor da gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 
189b4('bum): bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa da nga lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa
189b5('bum): de dag la yang bar du mang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rin po che gser dang / nor bu dang mu tig dang bye du rgya dang dung dang man shel dang bI ru dang dngul dang sa le sbram gang
189b6('bum): gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing phyir rgol ba mang ba dag go// rab 'byor de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa/ 
189b7('bum): dang kha don byed pa dang ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la yang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// rab 'byor kyis gsol
189b8('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de ni de bzhin te/ 'dzam bu'i glong 'di rin po che gser dang / nor bu dang mu tig dang bye dUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang dngul dang / sa le sbram dang ji snyed
190a1('bum): cig mchis pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing slar rgol ba mang ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang // 
190a2('bum): lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la'ang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// slar rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i slab
190a3('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
190a4('bum): byed pa dag gi bar chad bgyid pa ni bdud kyis byi nad kyis brlabs/ pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu 'am
190a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don bgyid pa dang ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gi bar chad bgyid pa de dag ni blo brgya shin tu chu/ 
190a6('bum): bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag la de dag gi sems myi 'jug go// de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa 'di myi 'dri myi klog lung myi 'bog go// kha don myi bgyid myi bsgom tshul bzhin du yid la mi bgyid/ 
190a7('bum): gzhan 'dri zhing klog pa dang kha don bgyid pa dang stonod pa dang / tshul bzhin du yod la bgyid pa dag la yang bar chad bgyi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de bzhin te rigs kyi bu dang
190a8('bum): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri myi glog lung mi 'dog pa kha don myi byed/ myi bsgom tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzhan 'dri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ngon byed pa dang tshul bzhin du/ 
190b1('bum): yid la byed pa de dag gi bar chad byed pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu chung ba sngon gi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma sgrubs pa dge ba'i bshes/ 
190b2('bum): gnyen gyis yongasu ma zin pa sha stag 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi 'dri myo klog lung mi 'bog
190b3('bum): kha don myi byed mi sgom/ rdul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing gzhan 'dri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang / ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi bar chad byed pa dag ni blo rgya shin tu chung bar 'gyur te/ 
190b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs che dag la de dag gi soms mi 'jug go// rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bying gang gang du bsam gtan
190b5('bum): dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag la bdud kyi las 'di dag kyang 'byung mod kyi 'on kyang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog
190b6('bum): ba dang kha don byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gong du bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang bzod pa'i
190b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang // nang stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed par
190b8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa dang chen po stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa dang don dam pa stong pa nyid
191a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang
191a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rang bzhini stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs
191a3('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa dang ngo bo nyid stong
191a4('bum): nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gong du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams yongasu rdzo/ 
191a5('bum): par byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / nga dbang po rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang stobs rnams yo dusu rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs
191a6('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu rdzo gas par byed pa dang // gong du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / bsam gtan rnams yongasu rdzogs pa
191a7('bum): byed pa dang tshad myed pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang mthar kyis gnas
191a8('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yong su rdzogs pa byed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu rdzogs
191b1('bum): par byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang myi 'jigs pa
191b2('bum): rnams yong su rdzogs par byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed pa dang / snying rje chen po yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed/ 
191b3('bum): dang / thams cad shes pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed na/ rab 'byor nga ni sangs rgyas kyi
191b4('bum): mthu yin par rig par bya'o// des rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o// klog go lung 'a bog go kha don byed pa'i tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// shes rab
191b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// go/ bsam gtan gi phar mong tu phyind pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa/ 
191b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// nang stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par
191b7('bum): byed do/ phyi stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// don dam pa stong pa'i
191b8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa sa
192a1('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stos/ 
192a2('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
192a3('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gong du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// 
192a4('bum): dbang po rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// stobs rnams yong su rdzogs par byed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yong su rdzogs par byed// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed// 
192a5('bum): gong du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// bsam pa/ tan rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do tshad myed pa rnams yongasu rdzo gas par byed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongasu
192a6('bum): rdzogs par byed/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yong su rdzogs par byed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yongs su
192a7('bum): rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed/ ting nge 'dzind rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yong su rdzogs
192a8('bum): bar byed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// snying rje chen po yong su rdzogs par byed do sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yong su rdzogs par byed do// 
192b1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
192b2('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang bstan pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir
192b3('bum): dgongs pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang lung
192b4('bum): 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang bstan pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// nab phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang chags
192b5('bum): kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang / lung 'bog po deng kha don bya ba dang bstan pa dang tshul bzhin du/ yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas ban
192b6('bum): ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'bri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha don bya ba dang bstan pad
192b7('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// byang shar gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes
192b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'bri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha don bya ba dang bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i dgongs pa mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
193a1('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang bklag pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don bya ba dang bstan pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir
193a2('bum): dgongs pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang bklag pa dang / 
193a3('bum): lung 'bog pa dang kha don bya ba dang bstan pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang
193a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don bya ba dang bstan pa dang tshul bzhi na du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
193a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sa kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rolalapa tu phyin da pa 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don bya ba dang bstan pa dang / 
193a6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin sa/ 
193a7('bum): 'di bri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang ston pa dang rgyal bzhin du yod la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do// shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rig/ 
193a8('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha don bya ba dang ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongasu 'dzin par byed do// 
193b1('bum): lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha dor bya ba dang gyu pa rje
193b2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa deng ngag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzind par byed do// nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu dang rigs
193b3('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzind par byed do// byang
193b4('bum): phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa grang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kying rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 
193b5('bum): kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin tu yid la byed pa de dag ni gi don tu brtson cing yongs su 'dzind pa byed do// byang sher gyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa'
193b6('bum): chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang yin ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dra ba dang / klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha do byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhi/ 
193b7('bum): du yidi la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzind par byed do// shard lho'i phyogs kyi mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang yin pa dang / rigs kyi/ 
193b8('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yod la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs
194a1('bum): 'dzind par byed do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa'i gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
194a2('bum): 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha don bya ba dang ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongasu 'dzin par byed do// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi byang chub sems dpa'
194a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don bya ba dang ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed
194a4('bum): pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongasu 'dzin par byed do// 'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed cig dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha
194a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang / kha don byed pa dang ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu ba rtson par byed cing yongasu 'dzin par byed do// steng gi phyogs kyi byang chub seMs
194a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri 'ang klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha don byed pa dang ston pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed
194a7('bum): de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na bud myed la la zhig la bu lnga 'am bcu 'am nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am bzhi bcu 'am lnga bcu 'am/ brgya'am stong zhig yod la de dag
194a8('bum): gi ma ci nas kyang myi na bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed cing / bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar nad myed par 'gyur/ bdag gi ma 'di la ji ltar na bar chad du myi 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bdag cag gi
194b1('bum): ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar bya na ji ltar bya/ bdag cag gi ma 'di'i lus la mi bde ba'i nyams med par bya na ji ltar bya/ 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa ste/ srog gi sbyin bdag go zhes de dag ma de la rim gro legs par byas pas
