230b5('bum): 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jigarten bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rte nad bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to/ chos kyi 'jig rten bsam
230b6('bum): gyis myi khyab ces bya bar spyod to// mr-ig/ ki rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
230b7('bum): 'jig rten pas ma gos myi khyab ces bya bar stond do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rtend bsam gos pas ma gis myi khyab ces bya bar ston tu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar/ 
230b8('bum): stonang to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam
231a1('bum): gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// lus kyi 'dus
231a2('bum): te reg pa'i 'jig rten pas ma gos myi khyad ces bya bar stonang // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rtend bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis skye/ 
231a3('bum): khyab ces bya bar smond te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston
231a4('bum): to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rtend bsam gis mi khyab ces bya bar ston te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsher ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond do// 
231a5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rtend bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar stond to// sa'i khams kyi 'a jig rten pas kyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten
231a6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// mye'i khams 'jig rtend bsam gyis myo khyab ces bya bar stond do// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rtend bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten
231a7('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'dzin
231a8('bum): rten pas mi gos myi khyab ces bya bar ston do// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond te/ skye mched drug
231b1('bum): rkyen pas kyi ses spyod to/ rig pa'i 'dig na pasam gyis kyi l+ya shes tsun / char ba'i 'jig sbed papas kyis kyi khyed ces bya bar nan tu/ sred pa'i 'dzig rten pas
231b2('bum): myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// lend pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston dang/ srid pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar sten to/ skye ba'i 'jig rten bsam kyis myi khyab ces bya bar med/ 
231b3('bum): to/ rga shi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar chos stond de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rtend bsam
231b4('bum): myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'i 'jog rtend bsam gis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i 'jig rtend bsam gri myi khyab ces bya bar ston
231b5('bum): to/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten pas ma gyis mi khyab ces bya bar stond to/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i 'jig rtend bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar stend to// nang stong pa/ 
231b6('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gris myo khyad ces bya bar stonang to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar ston te/ phyi ning stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gos myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// stong / 
231b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// mdon dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jog rten bsam gas myi khyab ces bya bar stond do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi
231b8('bum): khyab ces bya bar stonang to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar stonang to// thog ma dong / 
232a1('bum): bam myed pa srid pa nyid kyi 'jig rten param gyis kyi bya ces byabar rtson to/ dor bskyed pa stong panyid kyi 'jig nyen dusam gyis myi khyu ces bya bar ston to// rang bzhi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rted bsam gis kyi
232a2('bum): ces bya bar spyod de/ chos thams cad stong ba nyid kyi 'jig rten parnam gis kyi khya ces bya ba btsund te/ dgi ma rgyan nying stong ba nyid kyi 'jig rten pams kyis myi khya ces bya bar nin dang/ phyir phyogs pa stong/ 
232a3('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten pasam skyes mi khya ces bya bar byen te/ dngam pa byed pa slong panyid kyi 'jig rten bamam kyis myi byang ces bya bar snyedan du/ ngan nyi stong ba nyid kyi jig na pasas gyis kyi khyo ces bya
232a4('bum): nga ngo / dngos pa myed pa'i ngosgo nyid stong ba nyid kyi 'jig rten bamam kyi/ cho bya bar dran nga/ dran pa nyonar gan ga nas kyi kyi ga rtend parim gis skye khya ces bya bar rtsod do/ ba ga po / 
232a5('bum): mas kyi 'jig da pasas gis Shu ces bya brtan te/ rlu'adu gnang pa nams kyi 'jig ci sa ma gyis kyi kya sa / da te/ dang ngoms kyi 'jig rten bsas kyi
232a6('bum): ma kyirten kyis kyibyams bya / mgo pa'i dod mas kyi 'jig rnyed pa nas kyi sem par ma / ma kyi ga na las kyis kyim sa
232a7('bum): chad byed parnangs kyi ga nyid pangos gyi ni khya ces bya bar sman te/ gzugs med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'ag nyed panas kyis gyi byang ces bya bar spyod to// rnam pa sa 'argyad kyi 'ji
232b1('bum): bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond te/ rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon dpa
232b2('bum): myed pa'i 'jig rtend bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi 'du ni bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar ston
232b3('bum): te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston te/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten rdzas
232b4('bum): gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rte nad bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to/ byams pa chen po'i 'ja ga rten bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar smind to// snying rje chen
232b5('bum): po'i 'jig rten ngos ma gis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi/ chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar stond to// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig
232b6('bum): rnyenang bsam gis mi khyab ces bya bar ston te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ra 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rte nang bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston / 
232b7('bum): te/ dgra bcom po nyid la kyi 'jig rtend bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyad
232b8('bum): ces bya bar stond to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gis myi khyab ces bya bar stond to// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbeni zhes
233a1('bum): bya bar dan tu/ 'jig te rjes ben zhes bya bar nan / gzugs kyi jis rted de zhes bya ba na te/ capa'i 'dag zhes byabar spyod / dus kyi da pa
233a2('bum): ci zhes / snor 'jig rten khyen zhes to// 'jig rten pas zhes ba dzin te/ / na be mas bya bar sbyin du/ gag lag rte du na
233a3('bum): nga nga nas sbyin te/ shes pa'i ga na pyo sa/ ma 'i 'i ga da na sa
233a4('bum): pa'i jig dang bye nas te/ 'as pa mas pa 'jig rted cen nas bya na to/ sus kyi rnam pa shes pa'i 'a rten den zhes dzin te/ yang rna pa ga
233a5('bum): 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar ston to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben na
233a6('bum): bya bar ston to/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i 'jig rten dpon zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston do/ 
233b1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten du
233b2('bum): dben zhes bya bar stond to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar stond to/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend pa'i rgyand kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stonang to// yid kyi 'dus te/ 
233b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar ston to/ sa'i khams kyi 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rtend dben dab bya bar stond to// mye'i khams kyi 'jig rtend dben zhes
233b4('bum): bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar srond to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston
233b5('bum): to/ ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar stond to/ rnam par shes pa'i 'dzi/ ga rtend dben zhes bya bar stond to// ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben
233b6('bum): bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// reg pa'i 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar stond to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to/ sred pa'i 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar stond to// 
233b7('bum): lend pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stond to// srid pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar stond to/ rga shi'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar stonang to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
233b8('bum): phyind pa'i 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar stonang to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar stond to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dbe ni zhes bya bar stond to// brtson 'grus kyi pha
234a1('bum): sa pa'i 'jig rten chen nes byang ba tu/ man gtan gi pa mdu na pa'i 'dig rten na zhe A / sa kya sung byen pa'i di rkyed da
234a2('bum): na chung banyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya ba rjod de/ bye snang ba nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya ba ston te/ phyinang chung po nyid kyi 'jog rted ben zhes bya slong // nga panyid rlo pa nyid kyi 'jog da
234a3('bum): dpan zhes bya bar mend to// chen pa byung po nyid kyi 'jig can cen zhes bya bar ldan to// don mo pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig ni da ben zhes byar phyid te/ 'dul gyi rnying panyid kyi 'jig rten ce zhes
234a4('bum): man to// 'ayul byas ngas nyid kyi nga ga na de sa zhes bya ba sbyind to// mtha' lus 'das pa skyed pa nyid kyi sa na kyis bya na // bag sa sa byed
234a5('bum): nyebar gnag pa rnam kyi 'dzis rkyen ben zhes byang brten te/ mdzag par byung ba rnams kyi 'jig rten chen zhes bya bar sbyin to// rdzu 'phrul ginang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dpan zhes byab / 
235a1('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lam gi rnam pa
235a2('bum): shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor nga de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed
235a3('bum): cing 'jig rtend ston dra pa'o// rab 'byo rang gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rtend mtha' los 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ji ltar na 'jig rten mtha'
235a4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to/ tshor ba'i 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to/ 'du shes
235a5('bum): kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'odas pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// 'dra/ byed kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston/ to/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong
235a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar stond to// mig gi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong po zhes bya bar stond to// rna ba'i 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to/ sna'i 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa
235a7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// lce'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod do/ lus kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ yid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
235a8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// skra'i 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to/ de'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'dra/ 
235b1('bum): gas me na tu/ phyog gnas pa shes na pa sa sa/ la da sa la
235b2('bum): drirnam par shes pa'i rig todang pam mas 'das sa spong pa zhes thapa snyan nga/ sde rnam pa thos pa'i 'dog da mtha' las 'das pastod ba zhes byub ston / lus byin pa she pa
235b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong sa zhes bya bar byed da de/ mid kyi ma thar zhes pa'i 'jig rted ma pa' las 'das pa sbyong ba zhes smras stod to// myog kyi 'dus te rig pa'i 'jig nye dum ba mi
235b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ nA ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi garten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar smin te/ 'dus te reg po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'as bamyong ba zhes
235b5('bum): bya bar myod do/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mapar lastsa 'a su pa stong ba zhes bya bar rton de/ sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mnga' la su 'as pastong ba zhes bya ba dod du/ song kyi 'dus
235b6('bum): rig pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ldand te/ myig gi 'dus cirig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar smin te/ rna nga'i dzus temig pa rje
235b7('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyed kyis
236a1('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten mapa las 'das pa stong ba zhes bya bar gyun te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dmatha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i phyi tu
236a2('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rtenamathar las 'dus pa snyeng sa zhes bya bar rtsond te// sa khams kyi 'an sbyin mtha' las 'das pa stong ba zhes bya bar smin to/ chu'i khams kyi 'dog rtenamatha' las 'das pa spong ba zhes bya tsho
236a3('bum): ston to// me'i khams kyi 'jig tenamatha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to/ rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dmatha' las 'das pastong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dmatha' las 'dus
236a4('bum): po stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten da mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// 'du byed
236a5('bum): kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ste/ gnad to// mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'dres pa
236a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar stonar to/ skye mched drug gi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// reg pa'i 'jig rten mthi dza' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to/ tshor ba'i 'dzi/ 
236a7('bum): nin mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// sred pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// le na pa'i 'jig rten mtha' ldas 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// srid kyi/ 
236a8('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ rga shi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das 'ab stong pa zhes bya bar stonang // sbyin
236b1('bum): pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa spong ba zhes bya bar ston to/ tshul khrims kyi sa rnam tu phyin dang pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// bzod pa'i bar 'de
236b2('bum): tu phyin pa'i 'jog rten mtha' las 'das pa snang ba zhes bya bar stenang to// brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lang tu phyinang pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi/ 
236b3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong po zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stend to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mas
236b4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa/ nga nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar/ 
236b5('bum): stond to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa/ stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig / na mtha' las pa stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to/ don dam pa
236b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das
236b7('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong
236b8('bum): pa zhes bya bar stond to/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// 
237a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// myi dmyigs
237a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rte
237a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rtend mtha' 'das pa stong pa
237a4('bum): zhes bya bar stond to/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las/ 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 
237a5('bum): dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'angs pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten
237a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das
237a7('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzugs myed pa'i
237a8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par tha ra pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
237b1('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa'i 'jig rten mthara' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi
237b2('bum): 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// ting nge 'dzand rnams kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa ste
237b3('bum): pa zhes bya bar stonang do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// so so
237b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa'i bzhi'i 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
237b5('bum): zhes bya bar stond to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rte/ na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rgyu nad tu zhugs kyi ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
237b6('bum): zhes bya bar ston te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rtend mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ dgras
237b7('bum): bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
237b8('bum): bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rtenang ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
238a1('bum): bya bar stond to// ji ltar 'jig rten ngo ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig
238a2('bum): rten ngo ba 'di stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten nga bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten de pa nyid snang ba zhes bya bar stod te/ myig gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston/ 
238a3('bum): ti rna ba'i 'jig rten do mo nyid stong ba zhes bya ba ston to/ sna'i 'jig rten ngo ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ lce'i 'jig rten dngab nyid stong pa zhes bya bar snyen to// lus kyi 'jig rten ngobo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston teto/ 
238a4('bum): yid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngos nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to/ sgra'i 'jig te/ na nga banyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// dri'i 'jig rten nga bo nyid stong ba zhes
238a5('bum): bya bar ston te/ ro'i 'jig rtend ngo na nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston da to// myig gi
238a6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ na
238a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten nga pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten nga ma nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngo gzhong stong ba zhes bya'o
238a8('bum): byed do// phyag gi 'dus te ga pa'i 'jig rten chan shing ba zhes bya bar rnyan dang / rna ba'i yu te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar gad te/ dwa'i 'dus te ga pa 'angs na dung btsong su ni/ 
238b1('bum): sa byung ba zhis bya ldan te/ sa pa'i 'ag da ma ca mam nas nga/ su ga cujig da zhes / 
238b2('bum): drug gi 'jig rten sa na rung ba zhes byab ma snyedan te/ rig pa'i 'jig rten rab da byung ba zhes bya bar snyan tu tshor ba'i 'as da pa nyid stong gi nis kyir ldan te/ 'i 'ag rten po gis gos bya
239a1('bum): ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten zan stong ba zhes byabar gyun dang/ srid pa'i 'jig rten dang ba ni stong sa zhes bya bar ldan te/ skye ba'i 'jig rten nga sa nad stong pa zhes bya ra ston / gshi'i 'jig rten
239a2('bum): nyid dang ba zhes bya bar rjod do// sbyin pa pha ro lang tu phyini pa'i 'jig rten ma cang snang ba zhes bya bar rnyen du/ nul khrims kyi pa mang tu ning pa'i 'jig rten nga ba nyid stong pa zhis bya bar spyod du/ ston pa'i bam
239a3('bum): tu nang pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston / tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten nga ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinid pa'i 'jig rten ngob nyid stong pa zhes bya
239a4('bum): ra snor / brtson 'grus kyi pa rimang du ni da pa'i 'jog rten po meng stong pa zhes bya bar smin du/ bsam gtan gi pha ro lang du phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngon nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond te/ shes rab kyi pha ro ma
239a5('bum): da pa'i 'jig rten du 'i meng stong ba zhes bya bar ldan to// na nanganyid kyi 'jig rten ngas nyid myong ba zhes bya bar sngon tu/ panyid kyi 'jig nyo nga ma zhing byung ba zhes bya bar ston to// 
239a6('bum): byim chung shing kyilagri rnyed ngam nying nga po nis bya bar byed te/ stong pa nyid stong banyid kyi 'jig rten nga sa nying meng pa'is bya bar rnyend te/ rjebastong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten pa nyid stong ba zhes bya stong/ 
239a7('bum): sa kyi rig nga nyi stong zhes byabar da te/ 'dus byas sa kyi jim nyid byung ba zhes bya na tu/ lus sa gyu ny-i kyi lag da na
239a8('bum): bya 'dzin to/ mnga'a'as 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten sa nyid byung ba zhes bya bar ston to// logs nga sngam myed pa snang ba nyid kyi 'jog rten nga sa nyid dang ba zhes bya bar spyod te/ dang skyed pa sto ma'i
239b1('bum): 'jig rte du ba nyid snang ba zhes bya bar sbyin tu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten pan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig nang ngo pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rami
239b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston de/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten nga za nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtenang ngo ba nyid stong pa
239b3('bum): zhes bya bar stond to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
239b4('bum): pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnaMs kyi 'jig rtend ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
239b5('bum): stond to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston/ to/ stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar/ stond to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rtend ngo
239b6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten nga ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar snyan rdzoto// 
239b7('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid snang ba zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rtenang ngo bo nyid sde
239b8('bum): pa zhe bya bar stond to// rna ba tha ra pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhi bya bar ston to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dga'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
240a1('bum): myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid srung ba zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stong
240a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
240a3('bum): to/ so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten ngo ba nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ sangs rgyas
240a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten dang ba nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ma nyid steng pa zhes bya bar stond to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ringag rten na nyid stong sa zhes bya bar rlon
240a5('bum): phyir gyi'i na'i 'dig na nga pa nyid byung ba nas bya par smin to// ma pa nyi kyi 'a gi na dum nying byung ba zhes bya ba smin te/ chu kyi 'jig rten ngos nyid myongs zhes bya bar spyod ci/ 
240a6('bum): kyi ga sa kyi smos rlos na tu/ rnam sa sa sa sa spyad
240a7('bum): gas pa 'di sa mi 'i nyid byung bzhis pa / sa myong shes pa myed zhi gshegs pas 'ag mi mi pa sa da byu nas bya tho med
240a8('bum): rnams pa tsu she pas da/ ga sa kyi tshuman sa / kyi gyi nyid dus kyi
240b1('bum): 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// myig gi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston / 
240b2('bum): rna ba'i 'jig rten dngas pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ snga'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i rngam cing stong pa zhes bya bar spyon to// lce'i 'jig rten nges pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ mus
240b3('bum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
240b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skra'i 'dzag rtend dngos po myed pa'i dngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rte/ nad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
240b5('bum): to// ro'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rte na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhe sa bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
240b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rtend dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 
240b7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i rno bar shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jam par shes pa'i 'jig rten
240b8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhi bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to
241a1('bum): rna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus
241a2('bum): reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myeng
241a3('bum): mang ngon nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// myig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po
241a4('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te/ dag pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten
241a5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar stond to// lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po mye dpa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
241a6('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po
241a7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// me'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid sang ba zhes bya bar stond to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya sa
241a8('bum): stonang to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po zhes bya bar stond to// ma rig po'i
241b1('bum): 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
241b2('bum): bya bar chos ston ta to/ mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten
241b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar stond to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// sred pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// 
241b4('bum): len pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa/ zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
241b5('bum): ba zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo// bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten dngos myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar tshwa ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu/ 
241b6('bum): byind pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar smon to/ babad pa'i pha rol tu phyin
241b7('bum): pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rom/ 
241b8('bum): phyi nang pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i dngos po mye ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'arje/ 
242a1('bum): brnon dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ji
242a2('bum): bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// 
242a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
242a4('bum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar stond to// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa ni
242a5('bum): kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyi rjod stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'ji/ 
242a6('bum): rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to/ sa thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
242a7('bum): dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa 'ongango bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar smond to// dngos po myed pang ba nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos posgyur
242a8('bum): mngo na nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po skyed pa'i nga za nyid spong ba zhes bya bar sond to// dngas pa skyed pa'ingo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i dzin
242b1('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
242b2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar chos stonang to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo stong pa zhes bya bar stonang to// 
242b3('bum): stobs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i la
242b4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pazhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsamag/ 
242b5('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ste/ na to// tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ba'i ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa
242b6('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid song ba zhes bya bar stond to// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug
242b7('bum): bya dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma skyed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar smon to/ 
242b8('bum): mngon byer shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stond to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten
243a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba
243a2('bum): ston to// myi 'jigs pa rnaMs kyis 'jigs rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag pa rig pa rnaMs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo
243a3('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byis pa chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo
243a4('bum): nyid stong ba zhes bya bar sngon to// sangs rgyas kyis tshas ma 'dres pa bco rgyad kyis 'jig rten dngos pa med pa'ang po nyid stong ba zhes bya bar smin to// rgyun zhugs
243a5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyi stong pa zhes
243a6('bum): bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i
243a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes par ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gi rnaMs pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos
243a8('bum): pa med padzang ban stong pazhis byab stan to/ rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i kyi ngaganan ngas pa myed mang tsaning blang ba zhes bya par smin / 
243b1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhi/ 
243b2('bum): gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs gis 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chod pa'i 'jig rten bzhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten
243b3('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'ad byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// myig gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnas
243b4('bum): shes pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ lus kyis 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 
243b5('bum): yid kyis 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te/ gzugs kyis 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 
243b6('bum): ro'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// reg gis 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ myig gis rnaMs par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
243b7('bum): par ston to// rna ba'i rnas par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i rnas par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya ba
243b8('bum): ston to// lus kyis rnaMs par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyis rnas par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten
243b9('bum): ni zhes bya bar smon to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhe zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'dzag rten
243b10('bum): ni zhes bya bar ston te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhe zhes bya bar ston to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
243b11('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba'i 'jin
244a1('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond tau/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
244a2('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rton zhi zhes bya bar stonang to// so'i khas kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// chu'i 'khams kyi 'jig rten zhing
244a3('bum): zhes bya bar smon to// me'i khams kyi 'jig rten nyi zhes bya ba / sonod to/ rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// nasadamapa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa zhe
244a4('bum): pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// mjug pa'i 'jig rkyen sgo zhes bya bar ston to// 'a byed kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bar ston to// rnam par zhes pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar snyom
244a5('bum): dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten gzhis bya bar smon te/ skye mched drug gi 'jig rten ni zhes bye bar so nga/ rig pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar da to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten ni zhes ba yon to/ phreng ba
244a6('bum): nyin nisas bya ba so / ldan pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya / snying pa'i ga byin ni zhes bya bar mar te/ skye ba'i 'gyi gi gis bya bar sten to// nirnying gi nyi ni nis bya'i da
244a7('bum): phyi rlo ba'i 'jig rten na zhes bya bar rin// kyims kyi pa sa sbyin pa na ni ba ma // dod ba sa tu byed du mi tan ni zhes son pa
244a8('bum): tu phyining pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to/ thasam gtan gyi pha rol du phyinang gyi rje 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar stond to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar son ta song sa nyid kyi 'dzig rten 'i
244b1('bum): zhes bya bar stonang to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// rten gyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
244b2('bum): rten gi zhes bya bar stonang to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 
244b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang to// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang to// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stos
244b4('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stonang po/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi
244b5('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi/ jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'o/ 
244b6('bum): rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyu 'jig rten gi zhes bya bar stenang to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'a garten ni zhes bya bar smind to/ 'phrul gi nang pa rnams kyi
244b7('bum): 'dig na ni zhes bya bar byed de/ rang rnams kyi 'dig rkyed ni me na bar me kyi mas kyi 'jig rlu ni zhes bar gyi byang chub kyi ma gnangs kyi nyid ni zhes kyi
244b8('bum): te// 'dasam pacholas san lag brkyang par 'a gyi rten na zhes bya bar rnon ton bya lags pa bod pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ni zhes byabar blan to/ shems ga mdams kyi 'jig ni nis rgya ma
245a1('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa'i 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rtend zhi zhes bya bar ston
245a2('bum): tota mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ mngon par shes
245a3('bum): ba rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te/ ting nge 'dzand rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rtend
245a4('bum): zhi zhes bya bar stond to// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi ni/ su bya bar ston te/ byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 
245a5('bum): snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ste/ nad to/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
245a6('bum): to/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar smin da te/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rtenang zhi zhes bya bar stond to/ dgra bcom pa'i nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub
245a7('bum): kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar stond to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend ni zhes bya bar stond to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten pa zhi zhes bya bar stond to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes
245a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig rtend ston pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yadz+ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzug/ 
245b1('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// tshor ba'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// rnam
245b2('bum): par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// myig gi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond te/ rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to/ sna'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// lce
245b3('bum): 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// lus kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonang to// gzugs kyi 'jig rte/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to/ sgra'i
245b4('bum): 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar s+ho/ nad to// reg gi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig
245b5('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stend to// myig gi rnam par shes pa/ 'i 'jig rtend sto/ nga pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// rna ba'i rnam pa/ ra shes pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes
245b6('bum): nga'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa na
245b7('bum): 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten
245b8('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa
246a1('bum): nyid rjes bya byar ston to// sdig gi 'dus te dag pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong ba nyid ces bya bar sno da to/ na ba'i dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar rjod pa
246a2('bum): 'i kyim tshor ba 'dzig rte mi 'i sa te/ 'i tshus sa pa rji pa'i mig rten pa 'i stod tu/ sa
246a3('bum): pa'i 'jog rten myong ba nyid ces bya bar ldan to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i na gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong ba nyid ces byab rjod do// sa khams kyi 'dzi na nga nyid kyis kyib na chu'i
246a4('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ mye'i khams kyi ra 'jig tad stong pa nyid ces bya bar spyod to// rlung gi khams kyi dag rten stong pa nyid ces dbar ston to// nam mkha'i las kyi 'jig
246a5('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonang to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten nga stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonang to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
246a6('bum): ces bya bar stond to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston tu/ 
246a7('bum): reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// lend pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston/ 
246a8('bum): srid pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonang to// skye ba'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten stong
246b1('bum): pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
246b2('bum): phyind pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston na
246b3('bum): to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to/ stong pa nyid stong pa
246b4('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// chen po stong rang pa nyid kyi 'jig rtenang stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtenang stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to/ 'dus byas stong pa
246b5('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
246b6('bum): tete// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ der ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar
246b7('bum): ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid
246b8('bum): ces bya bar stond to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rtenang stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
247a1('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stonang to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa
247a2('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/ dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten
247a3('bum): stong ba nyid skyes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond te/ bsam gtan rnams kyi
247a4('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshad myed pa rnams kyi/ 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par tha ra pa/ 
247a5('bum): brgyad kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ mthar sti/ gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dga'i rnams kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed
247a6('bum): pa dang smon pa med pa'i 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// ting nge 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'dzin/ 
247a7('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar spod to/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar sngon du/ so sa yang dag par rig pa ni 'i
247a8('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya ba gon to// byams pa chen po 'jig rten rtso ma nyid ces bya bar stod to/ dripe chen ba'i 'jig rten stong ba nyid ces bya bar rtsod te/ sos rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tsho brgyad kyi 'dzin/ 
247b1('bum): rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rtenang stong pa nyid ces bya bar stond to// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
247b2('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong
247b3('bum): nyid ces bya bar stond to/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen mkhyend pa nyid kyi 'jig rtend stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// / bam po
247b4('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bzhin gshegs pa/ bskyed cing 'jig rtend stond pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rold tu
247b5('bum): phyin pa zabu mo 'di 'jig rtend ji ltar stond ce na/ ci nas kyang 'jig rtend 'di'i 'du shes su yang myi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa rolang gi 'du shes su yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
247b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba'am/ 'jig rtend pha rol gi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu myed do// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngan/ 
247b7('bum): chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni don dpag tu myed mchis
247b8('bum): pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam par
248a1('bum): slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyi na par gnas so// rang 'byor nga shes rab kyi mar/ 
248a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don myiman/ 
248a3('bum): pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor de ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rna
248a4('bum): kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i ngo/ na dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i don to// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de bzhin
248a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sa ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yi
248a6('bum): zhezhan/ rab 'byor da sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung ba nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs
248a7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha ro lung tu phyin pa don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ 
248a8('bum): rab 'byor sems can du bsdus pas bsdus pa la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung ba nyid dang / zas cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa la/ bsam pa dang dpag par nus pa de lta bu
248b1('bum): yang myed de/ rab 'byor de rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor de ji ltar na
248b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung ba nyid dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gzhal du myed de sus kyang
248b3('bum): gzhal bar mi nus so// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// 
248b4('bum): rab 'byor de ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa don mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam
248b5('bum): bas mnyam pa yang su yang myed na lhag pa lta ci smos te/ rab la/ byorang rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de ba/ zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rna
248b6('bum): kyis kyang myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshe gus pa nyid dang / rang byung ba nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam
248b7('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myang mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rlung sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs
248b8('bum): pa nyid dang / rang byung ba nyid dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni dpag tu med gzhal du myed de myi mnya
249a1('bum): mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga tshor ba yang bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi
249a2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor du 'du shes kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da 'a byed kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
249a3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byorang rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dmyig kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal
249a4('bum): du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ rab 'byor nga rna ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga sna yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
249a5('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byorarang lce yang bsam gyis/ myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnya ma pa'o// rab 'byor da lus kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
249a6('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de yid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi
249a7('bum): khyab dpag tu med pa gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga sgra yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byorang dri yang bsam gyis myi khyab
249a8('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byorang ro yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de reg kyang bsam gis myi khyab dpag
249b1('bum): tu rnyeng gsum du skyed pa ste/ sde mnyam pa dang mnyas par/ rab 'byor chos kyang bsam gyis m-i ltung dag tu myed gzhal du byed pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa yang byas kyis phyi
249b2('bum): dpag tu myed gzhil du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor na pa'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mi gna' du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang nyam pa'o/ rab 'byor pa'i rnam par shes
249b3('bum): yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed pa gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da lce'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab
249b4('bum): 'byor nga lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byord kyi rnam pa der shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
249b5('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byoradarna ba'i 'dus te reg
249b6('bum): pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mad gzhal du myed pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// 
249b7('bum): rab 'byor da lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
249b8('bum): mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg po'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed/ 
250a1('bum): rgyag nga mnam / rang kya na 'i ga pa rkyen kyis ci ga las sa rjes kyi nga ga myed panas mye d+he/ shA / la

250a3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rangab 'byo nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bas kyis
250a4('bum): myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'o// rab 'byor da sa'i khams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed// gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chu'i khas
250a5('bum): kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor da me'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpog tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byorarang rlung gi/ 
250a6('bum): khams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga nas mkha'i khams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myang ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab
250a7('bum): byor rnam par shes pa'o khams kyang bsam gyis myi 'ang gran myed gnal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dam rig pa ring bsam gyis myi khyab dag tu myed gzhol du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam par
250a8('bum): sra mnyam pa'o// 'du byed kyang bsam gyis myi khya dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam dang mnyam
250b1('bum): kharo/ rab 'byorang mying dang gzugs kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga skye mched drug kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang

250b6('bum): rab 'byor nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ mya mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab la byo ra bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gan
250b7('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang
250b8('bum): pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//

252a1('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor

252a8('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong /

253a8('bum): dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang yid kyi rnam par shes bya ba
