253b7('bum): rab 'byorang lce'i 'dus sa te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myang ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsher be bas kyis myi khya
253b8('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba bas kyis mi khab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// 
254a1('bum): as / rab 'byor ngasa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor chu'i 'ams kyang bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ phyis ma
254a2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmye khams kyang bsam gyis m-i khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rang mi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang rlung gi khams bsam gyis myi khyib dpag tu myed/ 
254a3('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorarang rnam par sha/ 
254a4('bum): pa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ma rig pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myod pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang
254a5('bum): myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag/ tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigaso rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa
254a6('bum): sgo myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rang byor mying dang gzugs pas ma gyis mi zhab pag tu mya gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yong myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor skyo mchad drug posam gyis mi khyab
254a7('bum): du ming ga zhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshor ba bsam gyis mi kham
254a8('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sred pa yang bsam gyis myi khab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi myigs so// rab 'byor da lend pa bsam
254b1('bum): kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor srid pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor duste
254b2('bum): babasam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngam shi bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myod pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ 
254b3('bum): rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed
254b4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ da rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myeng pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
254b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma da gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmigaso// rab 'byor bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu med
254b6('bum): gzhal du myang pa ste/ myi mnyim pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gis myi khyab dpag tu myang ge zhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga na
254b7('bum): stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myong pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da phye stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mu nyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi
254b8('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi myigs so// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mo khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
255a1('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis
255a2('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab
255a3('bum): 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmigs so// rab 'byor de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
255a4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmigs so// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa rang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
255a5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyig so// rab 'byor nga rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs
255a6('bum): rab 'byor da chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myang pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bas ma gyis myi mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
255a7('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bas kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dadangos po myed pa stong pa nyid dus
255a8('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
255b1('bum): dadam pa myed pa'i ngag nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigaso// rab 'byor dadran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa s+ho/ 
255b2('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams
255b3('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhol du myed pa ste/ spyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rang 'byor da bang po rnams pasam gyis myi khya dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// 
255b4('bum): rab 'byor du stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis ma khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang byang chub kyi ye na lag rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
255b5('bum): myi mnyam dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i khri lan log/ brgyad pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste mi mnye/ pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i bden pa/ 
255b6('bum): rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam po yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyig so// 
255b7('bum): rab byor chung myed pa rnams pasam byas kyi khya bag tu sa gzhas du myed pa ste/ khyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rlung byor dgazugs skyed pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnas bsam gyis kyi khyabang drug tu myed gnas du myong
255b8('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rnam par thadad pa brgyad bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu myed ge zhom du myed pa nya ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
256a1('bum): 'jug pa drug bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste myi mnyam dang mnyam pa'ang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtsha ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu/ 
256a2('bum): myad gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga mngon par shes pa rnams brtso sam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam la yang mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/ 
256a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang / 
256a4('bum): mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor myi 'jigs pa rnams
256a5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'o// myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorarang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams pas/ gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal tu med bu ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
256a6('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da byams pa chen po bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mying gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang snying rje chen po bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
256a7('bum): pa ste/ myi ma nyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
256a8('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med/ 
256b1('bum): s+yA khyi mnyam pa dang marnam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dpyir myi 'ang ba'i sras bu bas ma gyis kyi khya dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dro dgro bcom pa nyid byasam gyis
256b2('bum): myi khyib dpag na tu myed gnal du song po ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dang byang chub pasam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ 
256b3('bum): 'byor nga lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa
256b4('bum): ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs pas kyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis/ gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa las/ 
256b5('bum): ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shi / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i lding du 'a du shes bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis/ 
256b6('bum): shing myi dmyigs pa lags/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsdam gyi/ 
256b7('bum): myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis shing gzhal du ma mchis myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du migu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhil du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa la/ 
256b8('bum): dri'i sri du bamam gyis kyi khyab gtum mchis gnas sum mchis shing / ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa snyi byigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du mas kyis kyi khya nga gsum mchis gan sa dum mchis shis myi ma nyam pa dang / 
257a1('bum): ka mnyam pa myi myigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mu ga zhal du
257a2('bum): ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis rmyi
257a3('bum): khya dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags// ci'i slad du smra bas ma gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ 
257a4('bum): slad du dri bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ro bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
257a5('bum): myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa la gas/ ci'i slad du chos bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
257a6('bum): mchis shing kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa legs// tso'i slad du srog gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tum mo sa gzhas dum mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i srid / 
257a7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zasam gyis myo khyab dpag tum ni gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa bas kyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shi
257a8('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du lce rnam par shes pa bsam gis mi khyab pag tum mchis gzhal dum mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes
257b1('bum): pa bsam kyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ de'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa
257b2('bum): dang mnyam pa gyi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus te reg pa bsas gyis myi khyab dngag tu ma ni gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slang dun pa'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyam
257b3('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mya mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa
257b4('bum): lags da ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu dam mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyig/ das pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
257b5('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyi gas pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab rtsa ba dpag tu mni gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mya dmyigs pa
257b6('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bas/ 
257b7('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lugs/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnye
257b8('bum): pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
258a1('bum): ma/ tshor ba bsam kyis myi 'ab dpag tum mchis gzhal dum mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dbyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du med kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor babasam kyis myi khyabang pag tum mchis gan/ 
258a2('bum): ya du ma mchis shing / phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du song khams bsam gyis myi khyab cig tum mchis gzhal dum mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du chu'i khams
258a3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mye'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi myigs pa/ 
258a4('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu nam mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs rab lags/ ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
258a5('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam myi dmyigs pa
258a6('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu marigazhal du mnib ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs// ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
258a7('bum): pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mying dang gzugs pas gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
258a8('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye mched drug bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnye pa dang mnyam pa mi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg/ 
258b1('bum): ba lasam gyis myi khyab dpag tu skyed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slang du tshor ba bresas gyis myi khyab dpag tu medag zhal dum mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags ci'i
258b2('bum): slad du sred pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du len pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma ma chis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
258b3('bum): myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du srid pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye ba bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
258b4('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
258b5('bum): ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis mi khyab dang / rtag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam po myi dmyigs pa lags/ 
258b6('bum): ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang ma nyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol su phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu/ 
258b7('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags
258b8('bum): ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
259a1('bum): myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyam
259a2('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags // ci'i slad du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa las
259a3('bum): ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mi rlig zhal du ma rI pa ste/ 
259a4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid da bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam ba dang mnyam pa myi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma
259a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis m-i khyab dpag tum mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' la sa 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
259a6('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi nyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ 
259a7('bum): ci'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
259a8('bum): ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thas cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang / 
259b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam kyis myi khyab dpa ga tum mchis gzhal dus mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnas du ma mchis
259b2('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa las/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
259b3('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpog tu ma mchis gzhal du sa mchis shing myi ma
259b4('bum): pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnaMs kyi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnaMs
259b5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tum mchis gzhal dus mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam kha myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ru 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams pas gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myim ni/ 
259b6('bum): ma dang mnyam pa myi myigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi myi gas pa legs/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams pas kyis myo khya
259b7('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mya mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dumig/ 
259b8('bum): ba lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam lam yan lag brgyad phra bas kyis kyi khyang drug tu skye mchis gzhal dum mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams pasam gyis rgya
260a1('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngasam gtan gi nas bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis ga zhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
260a2('bum): ba myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad myed pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas pas
260a3('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par tha ra pa brgyad pas mi gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
260a4('bum): ba phyi mnyam pa sgyid byin gyi'i slad du mar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'drug pa 'o grubams kyis kyi ltab ngag tum mchis gnal dum mchis shing / skye mnyas pa nga mnyam pa myi myigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par/ 
260a5('bum): tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa bsam gyis myi khyam dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams
260a6('bum): bsam gyis myi khya dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i srad du ting nge 'dzind rnams bsas gyis/ mu~M khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi dmyigs
260a7('bum): ba lags/ ci'i slang du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis myi khyab pag tum mchis gnal dum mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis myi khyab sa
260a8('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi 'jigs pa bzhi pas kyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyig pa lags/ 
260b1('bum): ci'i slang dus sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi ngasam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gnal dum mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams pa chen po rnams kyis kyi khyab nga gtum mchis gzhas du pa rji
260b2('bum): shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chosas le
260b3('bum): pa bco brgyad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu me mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i bsam gis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
260b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
260b5('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
260b6('bum): du ma mchis shing myi mnyam dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub pas kyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
260b7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ de ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gnas
260b8('bum): du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags// 'phags pa shes ra zlum po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la 'arabs pa/ 
261a1('bum): dang ga pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang na da dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'du shes la yang byasam pa dang dngag chad
261a2('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'ang byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi ma / 
261a3('bum): ba myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig la yang bsam pa deng dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam dang mi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byar nga rnab la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor sa
261a4('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lce la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorarang lus la'ang bsam pa dang dpag/ 
261a5('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/ yid la'ang bsam dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi nyam pa mi / dmyigs so// rab 'byor de gzugs la'ang bsam pa dang dpag tshad dang mnya
261a6('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sgra la'ang bsam pa de nga dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang dri la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyi gso/ 
261a7('bum): rab 'byorang ro la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi mnyam dmyigs so// rab 'byor da reg la 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga chos la
261a8('bum): 'angabasam par phung pag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi rna bar shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga nas
261b1('bum): rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de sna'i rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
261b2('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// 
261b3('bum): rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang bsam pa 'dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa myi
261b4('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor da rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorard sna'i 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mi mnyam pa mi
261b5('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lce'i 'dus te reg pa la 'ang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
261b6('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshod dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la
261b7('bum): 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmigs so// rab 'byo rang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ 
261b8('bum): rab 'byor da sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorarang lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / 
262a1('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te
262a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorarang sa'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/ 
262a3('bum): chu'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da mye'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rlung gi khas
262a4('bum): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang / du dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rnam
262a5('bum): par shes pa'i khams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya/ pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ma rig pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs s+ho/ rab
262a6('bum): 'byor da 'du byed la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ rab 'byorang rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmigs so// mying dang gzugs
262a7('bum): la'ang bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor reg pa la'ang bsam pa dang / 
262a8('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sred pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga len pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang / 
262b1('bum): mnam pa dang skye mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor srid pa la'ang ngasam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor skye ba la'ang bsam pa dang zag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa 'i/ 
262b2('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rga shi la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa/ 
262b3('bum): myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorarang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / 
262b4('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga brtso dang na 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la'ang bsam pa dang dang dad pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de bsam gtan gi pha rol tu
262b5('bum): phyin pa la 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyind pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
262b6('bum): myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da nang stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byoraphyi stong pa nyid la 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
262b7('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
262b8('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor de chen po stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam sa
263a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'dus mabyas stong pa nyid ma 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang ma ma
263a2('bum): pa dang myi mnyis pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngad thog ma dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid la'ang bas pa dang / 
263a3('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang / 
263a4('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang rlo/ sa thams cad stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pra dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
263a5('bum): nyid la 'angabs pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigaso ga rab 'byor da myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la 'ang bas pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dngos
263a6('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dpag pa dang tshad pa dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/ 
263a7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang pa dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'ang bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa ni
263a8('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yang dag par spong ba rnams la'ang bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gi rkang brjes la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tsha dang myi mnyam pa skye
263b1('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmigs so// rab 'byorarang stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// 
263b2('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa myi dmigs so// rab 'byorarang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
263b3('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da bas rten rnams la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
263b4('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang tshad myed pa rnams la 'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang bsam pa dang /

264a1('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorarang myi 'jigs pa rnams la'ang bsam dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga so so yang dag par
