268a6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce la bsami pa dang dngag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// ra'abyor nga lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du mad la myi mnam
268a7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhol du myed lo myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ 
268a8('bum): de'i phyir yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs
268b1('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa rung myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sgra la bsas pa dang dpag pa dang
268b2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam
268b3('bum): bye myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rol bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
268b4('bum): gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med// gzhal du/ myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang / nga dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de chos kyi
268b5('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dmyig gi/ 
268b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la myi mnyam dang mnyam pa myi/ de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa da myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ 
268b7('bum): 'byorang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dngo mnyam pa dang myi mnyam
268b8('bum): pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid byasam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myid gzhal du srid la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i rnam par she pa la bas pa dang dpag pa dang cha dang mnyam par
269a1('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang myinyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa
269a2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam za ba ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bas pa
269a3('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa
269a4('bum): la bsam dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyi dwags so// rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam/ gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ 
269a5('bum): de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rna ba'i 'di sa te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la mi mnyis dang
269a6('bum): ste/ rab 'byor nga sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bas gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyig
269a7('bum): so// rab 'byord lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khab dpag tu myed gzhal du myong mo ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da lus
269a8('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid pas kyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
269b1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab
269b2('bum): 'byo ra mig gi 'das te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba bsam gyis ma khab dpag tu med gzhal dad med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'das te reg pa'i don kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsaman gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
269b3('bum): du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bas gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
269b4('bum): kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi ma nyam pa mi dmyigs so// rab 'byorarang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
269b5('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmyi// gas so// rab 'byor da lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid
269b6('bum): bas gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byo rang lus
269b7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang / 
269b8('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bas kyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
270a1('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa myi dmigs so// rab 'byor da sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sa' khas/ 
270a2('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam dang myi mnyam pa myi dmigs so// rab 'byor nga chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mye'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bas gyis mi khan
270a3('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mye'i khams la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rang rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
270a4('bum): myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid pas kyis mi khyab
270a5('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang / mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa'i khas
270a6('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bas pa dang dpog pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga ma rig
270a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid
270a8('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bas kyis myi
270b1('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mying dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
270b2('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du mad la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byo rang ste mched drag gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khab dpag
270b3('bum): tu myed gzhal du myad la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bas gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
270b4('bum): la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byoradu/ sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam
270b5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang len durje/ ngo bo nyid bas kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myang la myi mnyam pa dang / 
270b6('bum): myi mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir le nad pa la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed la gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
270b7('bum): phyir srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba la bsam par
270b8('bum): da dag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang shi shi ngo bo nyid pas kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myod la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rga shi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang ma / 
271a1('bum): dang mnyam pa myi dmigs so// rab 'byor de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bas pa dang / 
271a2('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha
271a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bas gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ 
271a4('bum): de'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmigs so// rab 'byor du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed
271a5('bum): la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa la byas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang // myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang bsam g+hi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo/ 
271a6('bum): nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bas rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tsheng dong mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol pa
271a7('bum): byin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myo khyab dacig tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro sa tu phyind pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor/ 
271a8('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la bas pa dang dadag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gyi/ 
271b1('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyarnam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor phyi
271b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsre gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga stong pa nyid/ 
271b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// 
271b4('bum): rab 'byorang chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab de/ dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyi/ ra chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnye
271b5('bum): pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la bas pa dpag pa dang tshad dang / 
271b6('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang ngas
271b7('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam po dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myang la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa/ 
271b8('bum): nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang
272a1('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsem pa drang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sdom gyis myi khyab dpag tu
272a2('bum): myed gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad pa dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
272a3('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mying mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rang bzhin
272a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du me/ dra la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// 
272a5('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khya ba dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad da/ 
272a6('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bas
272a7('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bas kyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du mang la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myi dmigs
272a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bas pa dang dpag po dang chad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid pas kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
272b1('bum): phyir dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam po dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang
272b2('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed/ 
272b3('bum): gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnaMs kyi
272b4('bum): ngo bo nyid bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la myi mnyam/ pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ba/ sa pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmyigs so// 
272b5('bum): rab 'byor de yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khye ba dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyi ra yang dag par spong ba rnams la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa/ 
272b6('bum): dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnaMs la bsam pa dang
272b7('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dbang po rnaMs la byas pa
272b8('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa deng myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid byas kyis myi khab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stobs rnaMs la bsam dang dpas
273a1('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag
273a2('bum): rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mya mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ rab 'byorang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ 
273a3('bum): de'i phyir 'phags pa lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi
273a4('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ b+h+ri 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dang/ dag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
273a5('bum): du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la ba sam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byorang tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
273a6('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshad myed pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs kyi ngo bo nyid
273a7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang
273a8('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dbug pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// 
273b1('bum): rang 'byor ngamathar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu'ang ba nyid pasam gis kyi khyab drug tu myed grazhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyi sa thard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsas pa
273b2('bum): dang zag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi myigs so// rang 'byor rnam par tha pa'i sgo stong pa nyid nga mtshan ma myod pa dang ston pa skyed pa'i nga ba nyid dusas kyis myi khyab dpag tu myi gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang ma
273b3('bum): ba ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang ston pa myed pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshe dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid pas kyi
273b4('bum): mi khya dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo
273b5('bum): nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam/ ste/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshaM nga dang mnyam dang myi mnyam pa myi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzus
273b6('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyos mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi me nyam pa dang mnyam pa ste de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bas papa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa myi mnyam po myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor / 
273b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngopo nying bas phyis myi khyab dang ga tu myed gzhal du myed la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bas pa dang bag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam sa
273b8('bum): myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa 'ani ring bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myi 'jigs pa bzhi la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tsha dang mnyam pa dang myiman
274a1('bum): pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsam pa dang dpag pa/ 
274a2('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dbyams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang
274a3('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
274a4('bum): myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs songs rgyas rgya chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag
274a5('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga rgyu nang tu/ zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed/ gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rgyu nang tu
274a6('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ 
274a7('bum): de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor da phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dngag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
274a8('bum): ste/ de'i phyir phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dag bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid pas kyis myi khyib dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ 
274b1('bum): de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dngag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byung / 
274b2('bum): chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ do'i phyir las
274b3('bum): gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmigs so// rab 'byorang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed la myi mnye ba dang mnyam
274b4('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / datshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// / bam po
274b5('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems gzugs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam/ pa de la gzugs dmyig su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis
274b6('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ 'du shes gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhi la du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes dmyigs
274b7('bum): su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi
274b8('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la myig dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dgag
275a1('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba dmigs su yod dam/ sna gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna dmyigs su yod dam/ lce gang bas/ 
275a2('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce dmigs su yod dam/ lus gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmyigs su yod dam/ yid
275a3('bum): gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid dmyigs su yod dam/ gzugs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmyig
275a4('bum): su yod dam/ sgra gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de sgra dmyigs su yod dam/ dri gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
275a5('bum): dri dmyigs su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ro dmyigs su yod dam/ reg/ gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
275a6('bum): pa dang mnyam me de la reg dmyigs su yod dam/ chos grang ngasam gyis myi khya dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos dmyigs su yong dam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa gang bas ma gyis myi khyab dang / 
275a7('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang bas ma gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ldan
275a8('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam kyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lce'i rnam par shes/ 
275b1('bum): pa gang bsam gyis myi khya dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod das/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang dasam gyis phyi khyab dpag tu byed gzhal du myed pa ste/ rmyi
275b2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod das/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang bas kyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su
275b3('bum): yod dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dag/ 
275b4('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyadapag tu mying gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la
275b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang bas// gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam dang ma n+ti/ pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te/ 
275b6('bum): reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa
275b7('bum): ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su song dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la myin
275b8('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
276a1('bum): tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myang pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyig
276a2('bum): su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gang la bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam
276a3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyig su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus
276a4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mye/ gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dmun sa'i khams
276a5('bum): gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myeng gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sa'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ chu'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
276a6('bum): de la chu'i khams pa dmyigs su yong dam/ mye'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mye'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ rlung gi khams gang bas kyis
276a7('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gi khams dmyigs su yod dam/ num mkha'i khams grang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
276a8('bum): dang mnyam pa des nam mkha'i khams dmyigs su yod ngam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gang bas kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa'i khamo
276b1('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ ma rig pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ma rig pa dmyigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
276b2('bum): du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod
276b3('bum): dmed mying dang gzugs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ming dang gzugs dmyigs su yod dam/ skye mched drug gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
276b4('bum): pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye mched drug dmig su yo du dam/ reg pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ 
276b5('bum): gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmigs su yod dam/ sred/ pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ myi
276b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sred pa dmyigs su yod dam/ len pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lend pa dmyigs su yod dam/ srid pa gang bsam gyis/ 
276b7('bum): myi khya ba dpag tu myod gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la srid pa dmyigs su yod dam/ skye ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye ba dmig
276b8('bum): su yod dam/ rgo shi gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa drang mnyam pa de la rga shi dmyigs su yod dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang bu gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
277a1('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dmyigs su yod dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
277a2('bum): mnyam pa de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su yod dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dmig
277a3('bum): su yod dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su yod dam/ bsam gyi pha rol tu phyin
277a4('bum): pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnye pa dang mnyam pa de la bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su yod dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
277a5('bum): du myeng pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dmyigs su yod dam/ nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nang
277a6('bum): stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de ye phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab
277a7('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la stong pa nyid
277a8('bum): stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ chen po stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi
277b1('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la/ 
277b2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ mtha' las 'das
277b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
277b4('bum): myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la thog ma dang ba myeng pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dgang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang man
277b5('bum): pa de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ 
277b6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu/ 
277b7('bum): skyed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ga sam gyis myi khya dngag tu myed gnal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa sa kyi
277b8('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yong dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gnas kyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzham du myed pa ste/ phyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su song dam/ robo nyid stong/ 
278a1('bum): pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
278a2('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dran pa
278a3('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ yang dag par spong ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rdzu 'phrul
278a4('bum): gi rkang pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams pa myigs su yod dam/ dbang po gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa
278a5('bum): ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dbang po rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ stobs gang bsam gis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myang ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la stobs rnams dmyigs su yod
278a6('bum): dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la byang chub kyi yan lag rjes dmyigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
278a7('bum): gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myad gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmyigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhan
278a8('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa dmyigs su yod dam/ bsam gtan gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la bsam gtan
278b1('bum): rnams dmyigs su yod dam tshad myed pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su yod das/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bas su
278b2('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par tha rad pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
278b3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dmyigs su yod dam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa deng mnyam pa de gnas pa'i
278b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag du myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la
278b5('bum): rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed par myigs su yod dam/ mngon par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu mye dra gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la
278b6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ ting nge 'dzin gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la ting nge 'dzin rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ gzungs kyi sgo gang / 
278b7('bum): shi / bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myang gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ myi 'jigs pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ 
278b8('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la myi 'jigs pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang bas gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la so so yang dag par
279a1('bum): rig pa rnams su yod dam/ byams pa chen po gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la byams pa chen po dmyigs su yong dam/ snying rje chen po gang bas kyis myi khyab na
279a2('bum): tumyed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la snying rje chen po dmyigs su yod ngam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpog su myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pade/ 
279a3('bum): dad la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmyigs su yod dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
279a4('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la la ni n+yag phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs su yod dam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
279a5('bum): bu gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam po ste dang mnyam pa de la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs su yo ngas dgra bcom pa nyid gang posam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzham du/ 
279a6('bum): myed skye/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dgra bcom pa nyid dmyigs su yo dam/ rang byang chub gang bsam gyis kyi khyab dpag tu me gzhal du myong ba ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rong byang chub myi gos su yod sa
279a7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyad dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam pa thams cad ma khye nad pa nyid gang bsam gyis
279a8('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
279b1('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ngasam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ mI mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin ni chos 'di dag ni ngasam pa bram pa'i byed
279b2('bum): bsam gyis myi khyad do// dngag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu myed pa'o// tshad dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du myed pa'o// mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir myi mnyam pa dang mnyam ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ rjes
279b3('bum): thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na bsam gyis
279b4('bum): myi khyab pa'o// dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas nas dpag tu myed pa'o/ tshad rmad las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal du myed pa'o// mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// 
279b5('bum): rab 'byor nga bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni bsam du myed pa'i tshig bla dag so// rab 'byor dpag tu myed ces bya ba 'di ni dpag tu myi rung lte ba'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor nga gzhal du med ces bya ba 'di/ 
279b6('bum): ni chung myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byorang myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pas mnyam pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byorang nga zhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam
279b7('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de la bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni nam mkha' bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dpag tu myed ces bya ba ni nam mkha'
279b8('bum): dpag tu myed pa'i phyir ro// gzhal du myed ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir ro// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri
280a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de dag ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab pag tu
280a2('bum): par myi nus ste/ de ltar sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal du med pa'o/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du myed do// de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rab rga
280a3('bum): tu myed pa dang gzhal du myed pa dang myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'dri bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar lend pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ dge slong ngam stong phrag nyi shus nye bar len
280a4('bum): pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen sa stong phrag drug cu dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag drug cu dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum bcus ni chos rnams la rdul dang bral la dri ma dang
280a5('bum): bral ba ni chos kyi myig rnam par dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phra ga nyi shus myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag bcom lnga/ na 'das kyis skal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhe
280a6('bum): lung bstand to// 'phags pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu bzhi pa'o// / de nas rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
280a7('bum): te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don du ma mchis
280a8('bum): pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom
280b1('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha ro lan tu phyind pa 'di ni don myi mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang / rab 'byor de de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha
280b2('bum): rolang tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don chad myed pa'i phyir
280b3('bum): nye bar gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don myi mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
280b4('bum): 'byor du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'dus so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa 'i na ninang stong pa nyid 'dus so/ gyi stong pa nyid 'dus so/ na
280b5('bum): stong pa nyid 'dus so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// chen po stong po// nyid 'dus so// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus songamaH
280b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'du sa so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus su/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang gi mtshan nyid/ 
280b7('bum): stong pa nyid 'dus so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
280b8('bum): 'dus so// yang dag par spong po bzhi 'dus su/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi 'dus so// dbang po lnga 'dus so// stobs lnga 'dus so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang / 
281a1('bum): pa 'dus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dus so// bsam gtan bzhi 'dus so// tshad myed pa bzhi 'dus so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dus so// rnam par thar pa brgyad/ 
281a2('bum): 'dus so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu/ 'dugs so// rnam tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang sprin po med pa 'dus so// mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus so// ting nge 'dzin
281a3('bum): rnams 'dus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'dus so// myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dus so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dus so// byams pa chen po 'dus so// 
281a4('bum): snying rje chen po 'dus so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus so// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so// 
281a5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus so// rang byang chub 'dus so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dus so// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rig
281a6('bum): spyi bo nas dbang skur ba srid brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dgos pa 'am/ yul gi dgos pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la blon za las su bcug na/ de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang
281a7('bum): rgyal po'i dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khur bor ba yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang rung
281a8('bum): ste/ de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni de dag gi bya ba byed do// rab 'byor da de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni bya ba chen po'i
281b1('bum): phyir nye bar gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni bya ba dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes
281b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phand pa ni bya ba mi mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar she/ 
281b3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo ni gzugs la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar
281b4('bum): gnas pa'o// 'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang mngon par cha gas pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du byed la yongs su 'a dadzi nad pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas
281b5('bum): pa'o// rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang mngon pa/ ster chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// myig la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas
281b6('bum): pa'o// rna ba las yongs su 'dzind pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna la yongs su 'dzind pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ lce la yongs su 'dzin pa myeng bar mngon par
281b7('bum): chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// lus la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid la yongs su 'dzin pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// gzug
281b8('bum): la yongs su 'dzind pa med pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// sgra la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// dri la yongs su 'dzind pa med par mngon
282a1('bum): par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// ros yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nyebar gnas pa'o// reg la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang mngo pa chags paseM
282a2('bum): par nye bar gnas pa'o// chos la yong su 'dzind pa myeng po dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// rab 'byor dmyig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myong ba rang mngon par chags par wA
282a3('bum): par nye bar gnas pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myang ba dang mngon par chags pa
282a4('bum): myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzi nang pa myed pa dang mngon par tshogs pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// dalus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mdo/ 
282a5('bum): par chags par myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shepa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myedapa ra nye bar gnas pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongasasu
282a6('bum): 'dzin pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna'i 'dus te/ 
282a7('bum): pa la yongs su 'dzind pa pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzi nad pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// lus
282a8('bum): reg pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas
282b1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed par mngon par chags pa skyed par nye bar granas pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshe rab la songs su 'dzin pa skyed pa drung mngon par
282b2('bum): chags pa myeng par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ lce'i 'dus te rog pa'i sgo nad kyis
282b3('bum): ba la yongs su 'dzinang pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myad pa nye bar gnas pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas
282b4('bum): pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'ji ngan pa myed pa dang cho mngon par chags pa myeng par nye bar gnas pa'o// sa'i khams la yongasu 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chags
282b5('bum): pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// chu'i khams la yongs su 'dzin/ pa myed par mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// mye'i khams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par
282b6('bum): chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// rlung gi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// nam mkha'i khams la yongs su 'dzind pa med pa dang mngon
282b7('bum): par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// ma rig pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon
282b8('bum): par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du byed la yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chag
283a1('bum): parkye pa rtse bar banas sa/ mying dang gzugs sa rangs su 'dzin pa skyed pa dang mngon par chags pa skyed pa bye ba nas par/ skye med drug la mas su ma na pa myed pa mang byar chags pa skyed
283a2('bum): bar gnas pa'o// reg pa la mos su 'dzind pa skyed pa nga mngon par chags pa skyed por nye bar gnas dang / ma kyimasal su 'dzi seM mngon par rnagapa pa skyed gnam than/ sred pas menas
283a3('bum): su 'dzin pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa med par nyo bar gnas pa'o/ lend pa la yongs su 'dzin pa skyed pa dang ngon par chags pa myed pa dron par gnas pa'o// sring pa mo yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang rngon par
283a4('bum): chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// skye ba la yongs su 'dzind pa med pa nga dang mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rga shi la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gan
283a5('bum): pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su 'dzind pa med pa dang mngon/ par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// tshul khrims/ kyi pha rol tu nad pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon
283a6('bum): par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su 'dzind pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su 'dzin pa
283a7('bum): myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu banid pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang /

302a8('bum): pa'i stobs gang yongs su bzung bar bar bya ba 'am mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam/ chos gang yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang mngon par chags par bya ba 'am/ gang gis yongs su bzung bar bya ba 'am mngon par/

308b8('bum): 'byor ngas kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzinang / yongs su myi 'dzin paso nye bar myi lend do// rab 'byor dngas kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo/ 
309a1('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzind yongs su mi 'dzind pas nye bar myi lend to// rab 'byor da ngas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yang
309a2('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzind/ yongs su myi 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend to// rab 'byor dngas kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma
309a3('bum): mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzin/ yongs su myi 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend to/ rab 'byor dngas kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzind/ 
309a4('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend to// rab 'byor du ngas kyang dbang po rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzin yongs su myi 'dzin pas nye bar mi
309a5('bum): len to// rab 'byor da ngas kyang stobs rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzind// yongs su myi 'dzin pas nye bar myi le nad to// rab 'byor dngos
309a6('bum): kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzi nad/ yongs su mi 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend to// rab 'byor da ngas kyang 'phags pa'i lam/ 
309a7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzin/ yongs su myi 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend to// rab 'byor ngas kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang
309a8('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzi nang / yongs su myi 'dzind pas nye bar myi lend to// rab 'byor da ngas kyang bsam gtan rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
309b1('bum): ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzind/ yongs su myi 'dzind pas nye bar myi len du to/ rab 'byor ngas kyang tshad myed pa rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma
309b2('bum): mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin yongs su myi 'dzind pas nye bar myi le nad to// rab 'byor da ngas kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjesu ma mthong
309b3('bum): bas yongs su myi 'dzind/ yongs su ma 'dzin pas nye bar myi li nad to/ rab 'byor ngas rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzind yongs
309b4('bum): su myi 'dzin pas nye bar mi lend to// rab 'byor da ngas kyang mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzind
309b5('bum): yongs su myi 'dzind pas nye bar myi le nad to// rab 'byor dngas kyang rnam pa/ tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas
309b6('bum): yongs su mya 'dzin yongs su mi 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend do// rab 'byor ngas kyang mngon par shes pa rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzin / yongs su
309b7('bum): myi 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend te/ rab 'byor dngas kyang ting nge 'dzinang rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzinang / yongs su myi 'dzin par nye bar mi len to// 
309b8('bum): rab 'byor da ngas kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzind/ yongs su mi 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend to// rab 'byo rang ngas de bzhin
310a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin yongs su mi 'dzin par nye bar myi lend to// rab 'byor da ngas kyang myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang
310a2('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzin/ yongs su myi 'dzin pas nye bar mi le nang do// rab 'byor dngas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
310a3('bum): ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzind/ yongs su myi 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend to// rab 'byor dngas kyang byams pa chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs
310a4('bum): su myi 'dzin yongs su myi 'dzin pas nye bar myi 'gro// rab 'byor du ngas kyang snying rje chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yong su myi 'dzinang / yongs su mi 'dzin pas nye bar
310a5('bum): myi lon to// rab 'byor dngas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa daH brgyad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su// ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzinang / yongs su mi 'dzin pas nye bar mi
310a6('bum): mnad to// rab 'byor ngas kyang rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzinang/ yongs su mya 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend to// rab 'byor
310a7('bum): ngas kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzind/ yongs su myi 'dzind pas nye bar mya le nang ngo to// rab 'barangangs kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
310a8('bum): bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin / yongs su myi 'dzin pas nye bar myi yin to/ rab 'byor dngas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang

310b3('bum): myi len te/ rab 'byor dngas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su myi 'dzinang / yongs su mi 'dzin pas nye bar myi lend to/

310b7('bum): par myi bya'o// yongs su bzung bar mi bya'o// tshor ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su bzung bar mi bya'o// 'du shes la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su bzung bar mi bya'o// 'du byed la mngon par chag/ 
310b8('bum): par mi bya'o yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// rnam par shes pa mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yong su bzung bar mi bya'o// myig la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongs su bzung bar myi bya'o// rna ba la mngon par chags te/ 
311a1('bum): mye bya'o// yong su gzung bar gyi bya'o// sna la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yong su gzung bar myi bya'o// lce la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasu gzung bar myi bya'o// lus la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yong su gzung bar myi bya

312a2('bum): chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzud par myi bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung par myi bya'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid la mngo/ 
312a3('bum): par chags par myi bya'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o//

312a8('bum): gzung par myi bya'o// yang dag par spong pa rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// dpong po rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// 
312a9('bum): yong su gzung bar myi bya'o// stobs rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzud par myi bya'o// byang chub gi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag gargyad pa la mngon par chags
312a10('bum): par myi bya'o// yongasu gzung bar myi bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par ga chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// bsam gtan rnams la mngon par myi bya'o// yongasu gzung bar myi bya'o// tshad myed pa rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// 
312b1('bum): yong su gzung bar myi bya'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// rnam par tha rad pa rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// mtha
312b2('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// rnams par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya
312b3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung / 
312b4('bum): par myi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yong su gzung bar myi bya'o// 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yong su gzung bar myi bya'o// sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par chags par
312b5('bum): myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// byams pa chen po la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
312b6('bum): brgyad la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung bar myi bya'o// rgyu nad du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongs su gzung par myi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'gras bu la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung
312b7('bum): bar mye bya'o// phyir myi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung myi bya'o// rang byang chub la mngon par chags par skye bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar
312b8('bum): myi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasu gzung bar myi bya'o// thang mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// yongasu gzung bar myi bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par chags par rtse bya'o// yongs
312b9('bum): gzung bar myi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// yongasasu gzung bar myi bya'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
314a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'di ni mab cing ltar dka' la rtogs par dka' ba ste/ myi rtag pa rtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa zhi zhing phra ba la mkhas pa dang pyad pa dang yid gsal bas 'tshal par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das seMn
314a2('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni dge' pa'i bshe na gnyen gyis yongasasu bzung ba dge'
314a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ni snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyu nang du zhugs dang / 
314a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su gyur te/ de dag thams cad la ye shes dang spong ba gang ci snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la gdugs cig
314a5('bum): tu mos shing bsams te/ gzhal pa dang brtag pa dang / dpyad pa gnyis na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig du mos pa de nyid ces legs pa'i mchog du 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
314a6('bum): dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ci snyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// chos rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam
314a7('bum): pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub
314a8('bum): semasad pa' sems dpa' chen po'i mu skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye
314b1('bum): dad par 'dus su// lan cag phyar 'ang pa' ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// phyir myi
314b2('bum): 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong pa gang ci tsam de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ye shes gang rtsi tsam pa dang spong pa gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems
314b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// / 
314b4('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pan dang gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' bsku la da pa// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub
314b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par
314b6('bum): 'dus so// brgyad pa'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rgya nang du zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong pa gang ci tsam pa de
314b7('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la
314b8('bum): bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ye shes gang ci
314b9('bum): pa'i ces la 'dod pa 'pheb pa'i bamed par 'dres so// lan cig phyir 'ang pa'i migs sa
315a1('bum): tsam pa dang spong ba gang ce tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba dang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub
315a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lho'i bu dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la nyan cing thos nas 'dzi
315a3('bum): ba dang bris nas lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni myur tu 'byung bar shes par bya'o// nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha
315a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar gyur da pa de dag ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las phul du byung ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i
315a5('bum): rje su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang brgyad pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i dang / phyir myi 'ong pa dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs par bya ba dang / gang la byang chub
315a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslabs par bya ba dang / gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
315a7('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba dang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba de dag rgya cher bstand do// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag
315a8('bum): gis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyind pa chen mo ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'di ni dpag du ma mchis pa'i pha rol
315b1('bum): tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pI da pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la bslabs shing dad pa'i rjes su

315b7('bum): ba zhig tu phyi nang nas myi snang bar gyur te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do// gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni gzugs/ yod pa'i 'khams su 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab

317a1('bum): 'dri ba dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun nub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na de dganas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par 'gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

317a7('bum): sngon yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bkrabs pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par 'gyur do/ gong du yang bris shing glegs bam du byas te/

317b1('bum): rtsa ba de nyid kyis myi'i nang nang nas shi 'phos nas myi'i nang du skyes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la yang thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur bar lta'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

318a1('bum): dnga' chen po/ byams pa'i shes kyi pa romang du byed pa zab ma 'di 'angs su 'dre ba dang / yongs su bdug pa byas pas/ na dgu pa'i nA tu des 'di skyes par rig par byam/ zhes ras skye pa rol tu phyis/
