321a1('bum): du phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ging gis sngon gi/ 
321a2('bum): mthar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid thos kyang yong su ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhas
321a3('bum): du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag cha byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan
321a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems kyi zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam po gzhum du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
321a5('bum): stong pa nyid thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// 
321a6('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ 
321a7('bum): nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar yang dag par spong ba bzhi thos kyang
321a8('bum): yongasu ma dris yongasu madres brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes par gyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor/ 
321b1('bum): gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du
321b2('bum): 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar dbang po lnga thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu
321b3('bum): brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems num par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang zag
321b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar stobs lnga thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi rol du phyinang pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems
321b5('bum): zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes
321b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang / 
321b7('bum): gis sngon gi mthar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab myo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi
321b8('bum): rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur/ rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar 'phags pa'i bden pa ba ni thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bas nang
322a1('bum): nga'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar bsam gtan
322a2('bum): ba ni thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan dpa'i tshe/ nim nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi can pa gzhan du 'gyuraro// 
322a3('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar tshad myed pa bani thos kyang yongasu ma dri yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ 
322a4('bum): nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi pa rnam gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dgazhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar gzugs myed pa'i
322a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du
322a6('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar rnam par tha rad pa brgyad thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa zab mo 'di bstan pa
322a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i skyes
322a8('bum): par 'jug pa dgu zos kyang yongs ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan
322b1('bum): du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myong ba dang smond pa myed pa thos kyang yongasu ma 'dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa
322b2('bum): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
322b3('bum): theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar mngon par shes pa lnga thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par
322b4('bum): 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar ting nge 'dzin rnams thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi
322b5('bum): pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
322b6('bum): gang gis sngon gi mthar gzungs kyi sgo rnams thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur tu 'gyur/ rmongs pur 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi
322b7('bum): rnam pa gzhan du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag phra ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin do pa
322b8('bum): zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dgazhan ying gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis smon gi ma tha ra myi
323a1('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum/ 
323a2('bum): par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thos kyang yongs ma dris yong su brtag
323a3('bum): pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gnan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang / 
323a4('bum): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar da byams po chen po thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongs ma brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem
323a5('bum): nu du 'gyur/ mongs par 'gyur/ sa sa sbyinam pa gan du gyuro// rang 'byar gzhin yang gang pag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gom thar ring rje chen brjod kyang 'ong su mdzes yong du
323a6('bum): pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang
323a7('bum): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i/ 
323a8('bum): tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar
323b1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid thos kyang yong su ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ ses
323b2('bum): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyu ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa paM gis gyis sngon gi mthar lam gi rnam pa she nyid thos kyang yongasu ma dris yongasu brtag pa mi byas pa don shes rab
323b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi pa gzhan du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
323b4('bum): pa gang gyis sngon gyi mthar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob kyang yongasu ma dros/ yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang dag par zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ ner nur
323b5('bum): du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi la mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
323b6('bum): bzab mo thos nas yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas ste/ nyi ma gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am bzhi 'am lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
323b7('bum): tu phyind pa za' mo 'di 'dri zhing rtog pa dang / nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis samu gsum 'am bzhi'am lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di myi 'phrogs par myi 'gyur te/ 
323b8('bum): yongs su 'dri ba dang yang myi ldan par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yang 'gyur te// gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongasu ma 'dris/ yongs su ma brtags/ de rjes su
325a1('bum): 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi rol du phyinang pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa la re tsam go dge ba'i rtse btso tsam pa dang / mos pa skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni bar ma dor mos shing bar bar myi mos par skye bar 'gyur te/ 
325a2('bum): ni ldam ldem gi blo ngas 'phrogs shing / shing bal gi gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dgang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas theg pa la zhugs pa la yin por rig por bya ste/ dge
325a3('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongs su ma bzung ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsnyon bkur mo byas pa'o// rab 'byor dgang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zad
325a4('bum): mo 'di'i lung ma mnos/ kha ton ma byas la tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas te des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyind pa la ma bslabs so// brtson 'grus gi pha rol
325a5('bum): du phyinang pa la ma bslabs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la ma bslabs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma bslabs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa la ma bslabs so// nang stong
325a6('bum): pa nyid la ma bslabs so// phyi stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi bslabs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lo ma bslabs so// chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
325a7('bum): la bslabs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// dor
325a8('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 
325b1('bum): rangs brgyud pa snang ba zhid lam 'arna bsas/ rab dang snang ba zhid sam pasabs sa/ rab na nga pa 'ad pa rlabs sa/ dam pasnad pa 'ang bas myong pa 'a rgyam tsungs pa/ dran brgyabar gnas pams
325b2('bum): ma bslabs so// yang dag par spong pa rnams lam bslabs so/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams lam bsgrubs so// dbang po rnams lam bslabs so// stobs rnams lam bsgrubs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams lam
325b3('bum): bslabs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslabs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams lam bslabs so// bsam gtan rnams la ma bslabs so// tshad myed pa rnams la bslabs so// gzug
325b4('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so// rnams par tha rad pi bsgog stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la ma bslabs so// mngon par shes pa rnams la ma bslabs so// ting nge 'dzind rnams
325b5('bum): lam bslabs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la ma bslabs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ma bslabs so// 
325b6('bum): byams pa chen po la ma bslabs so// snying rje chen po la ma bslabs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i
325b7('bum): 'bras bu la ma bslabs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lam bslabs so// dgra bcom pa 'dra lam bslabs so// rang byang chub la ma bslabs so// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
325b8('bum): pa nyid la ma bslabs so// rab 'byor dgang zag byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/ de ni dad pa tsam dag dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
325b9('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad lam bslas so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa da// sem smra so// 
326a1('bum): phyi nad pa zab mo 'di/ 'bri ba 'am/ klog pa'am/ lung 'bog pa 'am/ kha ton bye ba 'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar myi nus so// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
326a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri zhing lung myi 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu 'phyind pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 
326a3('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyind pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pos gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs so// tshul
326a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pas gzhan la myi 'dogs pa dang // nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la
326a5('bum): phran myi 'dogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la myi 'dogs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis dzin gzhan blan myi 'dogs pa dang / don dam pa stong
326a6('bum): pa nyid kyis gnan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa stong pa
326a7('bum): nyid kyis gzhan la phan pa myi 'dogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
326a8('bum): kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan/ 
326b1('bum): la phan myi 'dogs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 
326b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / yang dag par spong pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dbang po rnams
326b3('bum): kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis gzhan la phan par myi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la
326b4('bum): phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis gzhan la phan myo 'dogs pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 
326b5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la
326b6('bum): phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin pa rnams
326b7('bum): kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs
326b8('bum): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / byams pa chen pos gzhan la phan myi 'do gros pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa
327a1('bum): bco brgyad kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / rgyu nad du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
327a2('bum): bus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 
327a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ bsam gtan gi pha rol dang phyi ngon pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
327a4('bum): tu phyind pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun par myi spong / nang stong pa
327a5('bum): nyid dang tha mthun par myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mthun par myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dang / mthun par myi spyod/ don ngom pa stong
327a6('bum): pastong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa dang
327a7('bum): mthun par myi spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / mthun par myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mthun par myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ 
327a8('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi sbyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar
327b1('bum): gzhag pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ yang dag par spyod pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ dbang po rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ stobs rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ byang chub
327b2('bum): kyisayan lag rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang mthun par myi sbyod/ bsam gtan rnams dang mthun par myi sbyor/ tshad myed pa
327b3('bum): rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang mthun par myi spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang mthun par myi spyod
327b4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mthun par myi sbyor/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang
327b5('bum): mthun par myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun par myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang mthun par myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mthun par spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
327b6('bum): dang mthun par myi spyod/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun par myi spyod/ lag cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras dang mthun par myi spyod/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par myi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ 
327b7('bum): rang byang chub dang mthun par myi spyod/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang tha mthun pAr myi spyod na/ de ni gnas gnyis dngas gnyis po las gcig la gnas par
327b8('bum): 'gyur te/ de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gi mthar yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di mu bris
329a1('bum): ma bstan pa/ kha ton du ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid lam byas la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dis kyang / pha rol la ben ma bdags/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
329a2('bum): mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang mthun par ma spang bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bya'i rigs kyi bu'or rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis dngas gnyis po de las gcig la gnas par rig pa
329a3('bum): bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum bcu lnga pa'o// // rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su g+ha zhig la/ myi rnams shing ngam/ shing dum 'am/ 
329a4('bum): shing leb bam/ rkyal ba 'am/ ro la myi 'ju/ myi 'dzin dan/ rab 'byor da myi de dag na rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gi 'gram du ma phyi nad par/ dus byed par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da myi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su
329a5('bum): gla zhig pa'i tshe/ shing ngam shing du ma'am/ shing leb bam/ rkyal ba 'am/ ro la 'bru zhing / 'dzind pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par myi 'gyur te/ bde zhing nyam nyes myed par rgya mtsho chen po'i nas pha rol gi 'gram du phyin
329a6('bum): par 'gyur te/ mnyes ma nyams par thang la phyin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang / ldan pa
329a7('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa zab mo 'di mye 'dri myi ston / kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing mi rten pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyind pa myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi byed tshul
329a8('bum): bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'dri myi stonang / kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi nanang pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rolang du phyinang pa myi ston
329b1('bum): khadon du myi byed tshul bzhin du yang la ste byed cing myi nang pa dang / tshug khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa m+bu 'dri phyi snyanapa/ kha ton du bye byed tshul bzhin du ya la myi byed cing myinand pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rolang du phyin dang / 
329b2('bum): khye gyi rnonang / khaton du myi byed rgyal bzhin du yang la myi byed cing byi rtenang pa dang / nang stong pa nyid myi 'dris nang/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rnyi nang pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid bye 'dzi ste rnon
329b3('bum): kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi ni nang pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi
329b4('bum): byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi 'dzi myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston pa/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhi
329b5('bum): du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi sko nang/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rte nad pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin
329b6('bum): du yid la myi byed cing / myi rtend pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston do/ kha ton du myi byeng tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing mye rtend pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'bri myi sgo nang / 
329b7('bum): tor du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stonang / khra ton du myi byeng tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi sa nang / kha ton du rmi
329b8('bum): byed tshul bzhin du yid la mye byed cing myi rtenang pa dang / chos thams cung snang pa nyid myo 'dre myi'i stonang / khartan du myi byang tshul bzhin du 'dus myi byed cing mi rti nang pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi sgo nang / kha ton du mi
330a1('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri ma stonang/ kha ton du mi byang tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stond/ 
330a2('bum): don du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi 'dri myi ston/ khya ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rje nad pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston
330a3('bum): kha ton du myi byang tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rte nad pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myo dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi rtend pa dang / yang dag par spong pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston / kha ton du
330a4('bum): myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi bye cing myi rtend pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / dbang po rnams myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi byed tshul
330a5('bum): bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / stobs rnams mye 'dri myi ston / kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi byed
330a6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi 'dri myi ston / kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi 'dzi
330a7('bum): ston da/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / bsam gtan rnams myi 'dri myi stonang/ kha ton du myo bye tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi stond pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston da/ kha ton
330a8('bum): du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi stonang / kha don du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rnam par thard pa rnams myi 'dri myi stonang
330b1('bum): kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi 'dri mye smon / kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / rnam par
330b2('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni la myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du mi byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la myi rtend pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi 'dri myi snon / kha don du myi bye tshul
330b3('bum): bzhin du myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi
330b4('bum): byed cing myi rtend pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi 'dri myi ston / kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid
330b5('bum): la myi byed cing myi rte nad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / byams pa chen po myi 'dri myi ston pa/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la
330b6('bum): myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / snying rje chen po myi 'dri mye stonang / kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad myi stonang / kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la mye
330b7('bum): cing myi rten pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dmyi 'dri myi ston pa/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten da pa dang / lom gri rnam pa shes pa nyid mye 'dri mye ston / kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la / 
330b8('bum): byed cing myi rten pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i dmyi dri myi stond/ kha ton du skye bying tshul bzhin du srid la myi byed rnye myi rtenang pa de dag ni bar mdor byang chub las 'ams par 'gyur ro/ rnam pa thams cad ma
332a1('bum): pa nyid mthos ma mthong bar/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla ni myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
332a2('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don tu dad pa yod cing bzod pa dang mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba dang spro ba dang / mi gtong ba yod cing brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha
332a3('bum): rol de tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o// lung 'bog go// kha ton byed do// tshul bzhin yid le byed do// rto nad par byed do// ngo ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
332a4('bum): chub tu dad pa yod de bzod pa yod mos pa yod lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/ dga' ba yod/ spro ba yod/ gtong ba yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yod pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su
332a5('bum): bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi ro lang tu phyind pas yongasu bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
332a6('bum): rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang // nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa
332a7('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis
332a8('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dor ba
332b1('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
332b2('bum): ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
332b3('bum): bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung ba dang / yangs dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang pos yongasu bzung ba dang / stobs kyis
332b4('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gis yongs
332b5('bum): su bzung ba dang / tshad myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par tha dad pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
332b6('bum): 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang ma smon pa myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzind kyis yongs
332b7('bum): su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis
332b8('bum): yongs su pa dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / gleng rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshus ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyi
333a1('bum): su bzung ba dang / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas par ma dor nye zho myed par nyan thos kyi sa las 'das
333a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ sems can yongs su smind par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar
333a3('bum): bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byord 'di lta ste dper na/ bud myed dam skyes pa la la zhig bum ma ma bsrogs shing so ma btang bas chu bcu par sems na/ rab 'byor dbum pa de ni ring por myi gnas te/ myur du 'gyes shing 'jig
333a4('bum): par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bum pa so ma btang ba'i phyir te/ de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu mo'am rigs kyi bu mo/ 
333a5('bum): ngag la yang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod// 
333a6('bum): ga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus mye 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzug
333a7('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang tu pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs
333a8('bum): sum bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs sum bzungakyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs sus bzung / byin pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs sum bzung / stong pa nyid
333b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong
333b2('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dror ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhi
333b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis su ma bzung / dngos po myed
333b4('bum): pa nyid yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myi pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnam pa
333b5('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung // 
333b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad myed pa'i rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 
333b7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par tha ra pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i
334a1('bum): rna stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa skyeng bas yongs susu bzung / mngon par shes pa lngas yongs sum bzug deng nge 'dren rnams kyis sus bzung / gzungs kyi stonam
334a2('bum): kyis yongs sum bdud/ de bden gshegs pa'i spobs bcus mongs sus bzung / 'jigs pa pa zhes yongs sum bzung / mam ma bdag par rim pa pani sa mang sa sus bzung / byams pachen po
334a3('bum): ming du ma bdud / pa chenabs mangs sum bdung sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rjo brgya kyis mongs du mi cug gyung thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yangs sum 'grang/ lam gnas
334a4('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i kyis/ yongs su ma bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kye bu mo de dag ni/ bar mdor
334a5('bum): nyes nor 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// 'akra bzhis dbyang chupa
